GK19asvsaunu:3: gautamaḥ kapilo nāma muni dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:4: babhūva tapasi śrāntaḥ kākṣīvān iva gautamaḥ // Saund_1.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:5: aśiśriyad yaḥ satataṃ dīptaṃ kāśyapavat tapaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:6: āśiśrāya ca tadvṛddhau siddhim kāśyapavat parām // Saund_1.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:7: haviḥṣu yaś ca svātmārthaṃ gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:8: tapaḥśiṣṭeṣu ca śiṣyeṣu gām adhukṣad vasiṣṭhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:9: māhātmyād dīrghatapaso yo dvitīya ivābhavat // Saund_1.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:10: tṛtīya iva yaś cābhūt kāyāṅgirasayor dhiyā // Saund_1.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:12: kṣetraṃ cāyatanaṃ caiva tapasām āśramo 'bhavat // Saund_1.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:18: bandhumān iva yas tasthau sarobhiḥ sasaraoruhaiḥ // Saund_1.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:20: śuśubhe vavṛdhe caiva naraḥ sādhanavān iva // Saund_1.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:24: tīrthānāṃ cābhiṣekeṣu śuśruve yatra nisvanaḥ // Saund_1.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:25: virejur hariṇā yatra suptā medhyāsu vediṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:26: salājair mādhavīpuṣpair upahārāḥ kṛtā iva // Saund_1.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:27: api kṣudramṛgā yatra sāntāś ceruḥ samaṃ mṛgaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:28: śarañyebhyas tapasvibhyo vinayaṅ śikṣitā iva // Saund_1.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:30: pratyakṣiṇa ivākurvaṃs tapo yatra tapodhanāḥ // Saund_1.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:31: yatra sma mīyate brahma kaiś cit kaiś cin na mīyate /
GK19asvsaunu:32: kāle nimīyate somo na cākāle pramīyate // Saund_1.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:34: saṃhṛṣṭā iva yatnena tāpasās te pire tapaḥ // Saund_1.16
GK19asvsaunu:36: taporāgeṇa dharmasya vilopam iva cakrire // Saund_1.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:38: kecid ikṣvākavo jagmū rājaputrā vivatsavaḥ // Saund_1.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:40: pātraṃ śabdasya mahataḥ śriyāṃ ca vinayasya ca // Saund_1.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:43: mātṛśulkād upagatāṃ te śriyaṃ na viṣehire /
GK19asvsaunu:44: rarakṣuś ca pituḥ kautsās te bhavanti sma gautamāḥ // Saund_1.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:46: rāma evābhavad gārgyo vāsubhadro 'pi gautamaḥ // Saund_1.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:48: tasmād ikṣvākuvaṃśyās te bhuvi śākya iti smṛtāḥ // Saund_1.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:49: sa teṣāṃ gautamaś cakre svavaṃśasadṛśīḥ kriyāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:50: munir ūrdhvaṃ kumārasya sagarasyeva bhārgavaḥ // Saund_1.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:52: vālmīkir iva dhīmāṃś ca dhīmator maithileyayoḥ // Saund_1.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:53: tadvanaṃ muninā tena taiś ca kṣatriyapuṅgavaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:54: śāntāṃ guptāṃ ca yugapad brahmakṣatraśriyaṃ dadhe // Saund_1.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:56: muniḥ sa viyad utpatya tān uvāca nṛpātmajān // Saund_1.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:57: yā patet kalaśād asmād akṣayyasalilān mahīm /
GK19asvsaunu:58: dhārā tām anatikramya mām anveta yathākramam // Saund_1.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:59: tataḥ paramam ity uktvā śirobhiḥ praṇipatya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:60: rathān āruruhuḥ sarve śīghravāhān alaṅkrṛtān // Saund_1.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:61: tataḥ sa tair anugataḥ syandanasthair nabhogataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:64: tān uvāca muniḥ sthitvā bhūmipālasutān idam // Saund_1.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:66: nirmimīdhvaṃ puraṃ yūyaṃ mayi yāte triviṣṭapam // Saund_1.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:67: tataḥ kadācit te vīrās tasmin pratigate munau /
GK19asvsaunu:68: babhramur yauvanoddāmā gajā iva niraṅkuśāḥ // Saund_1.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:73: tān dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiṃ yātān vṛddhān vyāghraśiśūn iva /
GK19asvsaunu:74: tāpasās tadvanarh hitvā himavantarh siṣevire // Saund_1.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:76: paśyanto tadāśramasthānarṃ śūnyaṃ taiḥ niśaśvasuḥ // Saund_1.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:78: tatra tajjñair upākhyātān avāpur mahato nidhīn // Saund_1.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:80: nidhayo naikavidhayo bhūrayas te gatārayaḥ // Saund_1.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:81: tatas tatpratilambhāc ca pariṇāmāc ca karmaṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:82: tasmin vāstuni vāstujñāḥ puraṃ śrīman nyaveśayan // Saund_1.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:88: śāntaye vṛddhaye caiva yatra viprān ajītjapan // Saund_1.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:90: yatra svena prabhāvena bhṛtyadaṇḍān ajītjapan // Saund_1.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:92: arhato 'tiṣṭhipan yatra śūrān dakṣān kuṭumbinaḥ // Saund_1.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:93: vyastais tais tair guñair yuktān mativāgvikramādibhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:94: karmasu patirūpeṣu saicāṃs tān nyayūyujan // Saund_1.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:96: yad babhāse naraiḥ kīrṇaṃ mandaraḥ kinnarair iva // Saund_1.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:100: nājñāyā cetanotkarṣād dikṣu sarvāsv acīkhanan // Saund_1.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:102: sabhāḥ kūpavatīś caiva samantāt pratyatiṣṭhipan // Saund_1.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:106: niketam iva vidyānāṃ saṃketam iva saṃpadām // Saund_1.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:109: samājair utsavair dāyaiḥ kriyāvidhibhir eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:110: alañcakrur alaṃvīryās te jagaddhāma tatpuram // Saund_1.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:111: yasmād anyāyatas te ca kaṃ cin nācīkaran karam /
GK19asvsaunu:112: tasmād alpena kālena tat tadāpūpuran puram // Saund_1.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:114: yasmāt te tatpuraṃ cakrus tasmāt kapilavāstu tat // Saund_1.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:116: puryo yathā hi śrūyante tathaiva kapilasya tat // Saund_1.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:117: āpuḥ puraṃ tatpuruhūtakalpās te tejasāryeṇa na vismayena /
GK19asvsaunu:118: āpur yaśogandham ataś ca śaśvat sutā yayāter iva kīrtimantaḥ // Saund_1.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:119: tannāthavṛttair api rājaputrair arājakaṃ naiva rarāja rāṣṭram /
GK19asvsaunu:120: tārāsahasrair api dīpyamānair anutthite candra ivāntarīkṣam // Saund_1.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:121: yo jyāyān atha vayasā guṇaiś ca teṣāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ vṛṣabha ivaujasā vṛṣāṇām /
GK19asvsaunu:122: te tatra priyaguruvas tam abhyaṣiñcann ādityā daśaśatalocanaṃ divīva // Saund_1.61 //
GK19asvsaunu:123: ācāravān vinayavān nayavān kriyāvān dharmāya nendriyadukhāya dhṛtātparaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:124: tadbhrātṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ sa jugopa rāṣṭraṃ saṃkrandano divam ivānuṣrto marudbhiḥ // Saund_1.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:125: Saundaranada mahākāvye kapilavāstuvarṇano nāma prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:127: tataḥ kadā cit kālena tad avāpa kulakramāt /
GK19asvsaunu:128: rāja śuddhodhano nāma śuddhakarmā jitendriyaḥ // Saund_2.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:129: yaḥ sasañje na kāmeṣu śrīpāptau na visismiye /
GK19asvsaunu:130: nāvamene parānṛddhyā parebhyo nāpi vivyathe // Saund_2.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:132: vikrānto nayvāṃś caiva dhīraḥ sumukha eva ca // Saund_2.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:133: vapuṣmāṃś ca na ca stabdho dakṣiṇo na ca nārajavaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:134: tejasvī na ca na kṣāntaḥ kartā ca na ca vismitaḥ // Saund_2.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:135: ākṣiptaḥ śatrubhiḥ saṃkhye suhṛdbhiś ca vyapāśritaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:136: abhavad yo na vimukhas tejasā ditsayaiva ca // Saund_2.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:137: yaḥ pūrvai rājabhir yātāṃ yiyāsur dharmapaddhatim /
GK19asvsaunu:138: rājyaṃ dīkṣām iva vahan vṛttetānvagamat pitṝn // Saund_2.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:139: yasya suvyahārāc ca rakṣanāc ca sukhaṃ prajāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:140: śiśyire vigatodvegāḥ pitur aṅkagatā iva // Saund_2.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:141: kṛtaśāstraḥ kṛtāstro vā jāto vā vipule kule /
GK19asvsaunu:142: akṛtārtho na dadṛśe yasya darśanameyivān // Saund_2.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:143: hitaṃ vipriyam apy ukto yaḥ śuśrāva na cukṣubhe /
GK19asvsaunu:144: duṣkṛtaṃ bahv api tyaktvā sasmāra kṛtam aṇv api // Saund_2.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:148: arjayanto dadṛśire dhanānīva guṇān api // Saund_2.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:149: adhyaiṣṭa yaḥ paraṃ brahma na vyaiṣṭa satataṃ dhṛteḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:150: dānān yadita pātrebhyaḥ pāpaṃ nākṛta kiṃ cana // Saund_2.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:152: na hy avānchīc eyutaḥ satyān muhūrtam api jīvitam // Saund_2.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:154: vyarociṣta ca śiṣṭebhyo māsīṣe candramā iva // Saund_2.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:155: avedīd buddhiśāstrābhyām iha cāmutra ca kṣamam /
GK19asvsaunu:156: arakṣīd dhairyavīryābhyām indriyāṇy api ca prajāḥ // Saund_2.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:157: ahārṣīd duḥkham ārtānāṃ dviṣatāṃ corjitaṃ yaśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:158: acaiṣte ca nayair bhūmiṃ bhūyasā yaśasaiva ca // Saund_2.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:159: apy āsīd duḥkhitān paśyan prakṛtyā karuṇātmakaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:160: nāhauṣte ca yaśo lobhād anyāyādhigatair dhanaiḥ // Saund_2.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:162: nādidāsīdaditsīt tu saumukhvāt svaṃ svam arthavat // Saund_2.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:163: anivedyāgram arhadbhyo nālikṣat hiṃ cid aplutaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:164: gām adharmeṇa nādhukṣat kṣīratarṣeṇa gām iva // Saund_2.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:165: nāsṛkṣad balim aprāptaṃ nārukṣan mānam aiśvaram /
GK19asvsaunu:166: āgamair buddhim āhikṣad dharmāya na tu kīrtaye // Saund_2.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:167: kleśārhān api kāṃś ci tu nākliṣṭa kliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:168: āryabhāvāc ca nāghukṣad dviṣato 'pi sato guṇān // Saund_2.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:169: ākṛṣad vapuṣā dṛṣṭīḥ prajānāṃ candramā iva /
GK19asvsaunu:170: parasvaṃ bhuvi nāmṛkṣan mahāviṣam ivoragam // Saund_2.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:171: nākrukṣad viṣaye tasya kaś cit kaiś cit kva cit kṣataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:172: adikṣat tasya hastastham ārtebhyo hy abhayaṃ dhanuḥ // Saund_2.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:174: adarśat snighayā dṛṣṭyā ślakṣṇena vacasāsicat // Saund_2.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:176: adarśat kārtayuge dharme dharmāt kṛcchre 'pi nāsrasat // Saund_2.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:178: avartiṣṭa ca vṛddheṣu nāvṛtad garhite pathi // Saund_2.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:179: śarair aśīśam acchatrūn guṇair bandhūn arīramat /
GK19asvsaunu:180: randhrair nācūcudad bhṛtyān karair nāpīpiḍat prajāḥ // Saund_2.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:181: rakṣaṇāc caiva śauryāc ca nikhilāṃ gām avīvapat /
GK19asvsaunu:182: spaṣṭayā daṇḍanītyā ca rātrisattrān avīvapat // Saund_2.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:184: dīptyā tama ivādityas tejasārīn avīvapat // Saund_2.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:188: rājadharmasthiatvāc ca kāle sasyam asūṣavat // Saund_2.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:191: rāṣṭram anyatra ca baler na sa kiṅ cid dadīdapat /
GK19asvsaunu:192: bhṛtyair eva ca sodyogaṃ dviṣaddarpam adīdapat // Saund_2.33 /
GK19asvsaunu:193: svair evādīdapac cāpi bhūyo bhūyo guṇaiḥ kulam /
GK19asvsaunu:196: pālanāc ca cvijān brahma nirduvignān amīmapat // Saund_2.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:198: tapasā tejasā caiva dviṣatsainyam amīmapat // Saund_2.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:200: darśanāc caiva dharmasya kāle svargam avīvasat // Saund_2.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:202: priya ity eva cāśaktaṃ na saṃrāgād avīvṛdhat // Saund_2.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:203: tejasā ca tviṣā caiva ripūn dṛptān abhībhasat /
GK19asvsaunu:204: yaśodīpena dīptena pṛthivīṃ ca vyabhībhasat // Saund_2.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:206: dravyaṃ mahad api tyaktvā na caivākīrti kiṃ cana // Saund_2.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:208: jitvā dṛptān api ripūn na tenākāri vismayaḥ // Saund_2.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:209: na tenābhedi māryādā kāmād dveṣād bhayād api /
GK19asvsaunu:210: tena satsv api bhogeṣu nāsevīndriyavṛttitā // Saund_2.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:211: na tenārdarśi viṣamaṃ kāryaṅ kva cana kiṃ cana /
GK19asvsaunu:212: vipriyapriyayoḥ kṛtye na tenāgāmi nikriyāḥ // Saund_2.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:213: tenāpāyi yathākalpaṃ somaś ca yaśa eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:214: vedaś cāmnāyi satataṃ vedokto dharma eva ca // Saund_2.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:217: atha tasmin tathā kāle dharmakāmā divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:218: vicerur diśi lokasya dharmacaryā didṛkṣavaḥ // Saund_2.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:220: dadṛśus taṃ viśeṣeṇa dharmātmānaṃ narādhipam // Saund_2.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:222: upapattiṃ praṇidadhe kule tasya mahīpateḥ // Saund_2.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:223: tasya devī nṛdevasya māyā nāma tadābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:225: svapne 'tha samaye garbham āviśantaṃ dadarśa sā /
GK19asvsaunu:226: ṣaḍdantaṃ vāraṇaṃ śvetam airāvatam ivaujasā // Saund_2.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:227: taṃ vinirdidiṣuḥ śrutvā svapnaṃ svapnavido dvijāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:233: divi dundubhayo nedur dīvyatāṃ marutām iva /
GK19asvsaunu:234: didīpe 'bhyadhiaṃ sūryaḥ śivaś ca pavano vavau // Saund_2.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:235: tutuṣus tuṣitāś caiva śuddhāvāsāś ca devatāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:238: babhrāje śāntayā lakṣmyā dharmo vigrahavān iva // Saund_2.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:239: devyām api yavīyasyām araṇyām iva pāvakaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:240: nando nāma suto jajñe nityānandakaraḥ kule // Saund_2.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:242: vapuṣāgryeṇa yo nāma sundaropapadaṃ dadhe // Saund_2.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:243: madhumāsa iva prāptaś candro naa ivoditaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:244: aṅgavān iva cānaṅgaḥ sa babhau kāntayā śriyā // Saund_2.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:245: sa tau saṃvardhayāmāsa narendraḥ parayā mudā /
GK19asvsaunu:246: arthaḥ sajjanahastastho dharmakāmau mahān iva // Saund_2.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:247: tasya kālena satputrau vavṛdhāte bhavāya tau /
GK19asvsaunu:249: tayoḥ satputrayor madhye śākyarājo rarāja saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:251: tatas tayoḥ saṃskṛtayoḥ krameṇa narendrasūnvoḥ kṛtavidyayoś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:252: kāmeṣv ajasraṅ pramamāda nandaḥ sarvārthasiddhas tu na saṃrarañja // Saund_2.63 //
GK19asvsaunu:253: sa prekśyaiva hi jīrṇam āturaṅ ca mṛtaṅ ca vimṛśan jagadanbhijñam ārtacittaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:254: hṛdayagataparaghṛṇo na viṣayaratim agamaj jananamaraṇabhayam abhito vijighāṃsuḥ // Saund_2.64 //
GK19asvsaunu:255: udvegād apunarbhave manaḥ praṇidhāya sa yayau śayitavarāṅganādanāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:256: niśi nṛpatinilayanād vanagamankṛtmanāḥ sarasa iva mathitanalināt kalahaṃsaḥ // Saund_2.65 //
GK19asvsaunu:257: Saundaranande mahākāvye rājavarṇano nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:260: śrīmad abhayam anuraktajanaṃ sa vihāya viścitamanā vanaṃ yayau // Saund_3.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:261: vividhāgmāṃs tapasi tāṃś ca vividhaniyamāśrayān munīn /
GK19asvsaunu:262: prekṣya sa viṣayatṛākṛpaṇān anavasthitaṃ tapa iti nyavartata // Saund_3.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:264: tattvakṛtamatir upāsya jahāvayam apy amārga iti māgakovidaḥ // Saund_3.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:265: sa vicārayan jagati kiṃ nu paramam iti taṃ tam āgamam /
GK19asvsaunu:266: niścayam anadhigataḥ parataḥ paramaṃ cacāra tapa eva duṣkaram // Saund_3.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:267: atha naiṣa mārga iti vikṣya tad api vipulaṃ jahau tapaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:268: dhyānaviṣayam avagamya paraṃ bubhuje varānnam amṛtatvabuddhaye // Saund_3.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:270: plakṣam avaniruham abhyagamat paramasya niścayavidher bubhutsayā // Saund_3.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:272: mārabalam ajayad ugram atho bubudhe padaṃ śivam ahāryam avyayam // Saund_3.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:273: avagamya taṃ ca kṛtakāryam amṛtamanaso divaukasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:274: harṣam atulam agaman muditā vimukhī tu mārapariṣat pracukṣubhe // Saund_3.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:275: sanagā ca bhūḥ pravicāla hutavahasakaḥ śivo vavau /
GK19asvsaunu:276: nedur api ca suradundubhayaḥ pravavarṣa cāmbudharavarjitaṃ nabhaḥ // Saund_3.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:277: avabudhya caiva paramārtham ajaram anukampayā vibhuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:278: nityam amṛtam upadarśyituṃ sa varāñasīparikarām ayāt purīm // Saund_3.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:280: tatra vinayanimāram ṛṣir jagato hitāya pariṣady avartayat // Saund_3.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:281: iti duḥkham etad iyam asya samudayalatā pravartikā /
GK19asvsaunu:282: śāntir iyam ayam upāya iti pravibhāgaśaḥ param idaṃ catuṣṭayam // Saund_3.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:283: abhidhāya ca triparivartam atulam anivartyam uttamam /
GK19asvsaunu:284: dvādaśaniyatavikalpam ṛṣir vinināya kauṇḍinasagotram āditaḥ // Saund_3.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:285: sa hi doṣasāgaram agādham upadhijalam ādhijanutkam /
GK19asvsaunu:286: krodhamadabhayatarṅgacalaṃ pratatāra lokam api vyatārayat // Saund_3.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:287: sa vinīya kāśiṣu gayeṣu bahujanam atho girivraje /
GK19asvsaunu:288: pitryam api paramakāruṇiko nagaraṃ yayāv anujighṛkṣayā tadā // Saund_3.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:290: sūryasadṛśavapur abhyudito vijahāra sūrya iva gautamas tamaḥ // Saund_3.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:292: vastumatiśuci śivopavanaṃ sa dadarśa niḥspṛhatayā yathā vanam // Saund_3.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:293: aparigrahaḥ sa hi babhūva niyatamatir ātmanīśvaraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:295: pratipūjayā na sa jaharṣa na ca śucam avajñayāgamat /
GK19asvsaunu:296: niścitamatir asicandanayor na jagāma duḥkhasukhayoś ca vikriyām // Saund_3.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:297: atha pārthivaḥ samupalabhya sutam upagataṃ tathāgatam /
GK19asvsaunu:299: sugatas tathāgatam avekṣya narapatim adhīram āśayā /
GK19asvsaunu:300: śeṣam api ca janam aśrumukhaṃ vinīṣaya gaganam utpapāta ha // Saund_3.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:301: sa vicakrame divi bhuvīva punar upaviveśa tasthivān /
GK19asvsaunu:302: niścalamatir aśayiṣṭa punar bahudhābhavat punar abhūt tathaikadhā // Saund_3.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:303: salile kṣitāv iva cacāra jalam iva viveṣa medinīm /
GK19asvsaunu:304: megha iva divi vavarṣa punaḥ punar ajvalan nava ivodito raviḥ // Saund_3.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:305: yugapaj jvalan jvalanavac ca jalam avasṛhaṃś ca meghavat /
GK19asvsaunu:306: taptakanakasadṛśaprabhayā sa babhau pradīpta iva sandhyayā ghanaḥ // Saund_3.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:308: prītim agamad atulāṃ nṛpatir janatā natāś ca bahumānam abhyayuḥ // Saund_3.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:310: paurajanam api ca tatpravaṇaṃ nijagāda dharmavinayaṃ vināyakaḥ // Saund_3.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:311: nṛpatis tataḥ prathamam āpa phalam amṛtadharmasiddhayoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:312: dharmam atulam adhigamya muner munaye nanāma sa yato gurāv iva // Saund_3.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:314: śākyatanayavṛṣabhāḥ kṛtino vṛṣabhā invānalabhayāt pravavrajuḥ // Saund_3.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:315: vijahus tu ye 'pi na gṛhāṇi tanayapitṛmātrapekṣayā /
GK19asvsaunu:316: te 'pi niyamavidhimāmaraṇāj jagṛhuś ca yuktamanasaś ca daghrire // Saund_3.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:317: na jihiṃsa sūkṣmam api jantum api paravadhopajīvanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:318: kiṃ bata vipulaguñaḥ kulajaḥ sadayaḥ sadā kimu muner upāsayā // Saund_3.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:320: nānyadhanam apajahāra tathā bhujagād ivānyavibhavād dhi vivyathe // Saund_3.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:322: naiva ca parayuvatīr agamat paramaṃ hi tā dhanato 'py amanyata // Saund_3.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:323: anṛtaṃ jagāda na ca kaś cid ṛtam api jajalpa nāpriyam /
GK19asvsaunu:324: ślakṣṇam api ca na jagāv ahitaṃ hitam apy uvāca na ca paiśunāya yat // Saund_3.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:325: manasā lulobha na ca jātu paravasuṣu gṛddhamānasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:326: kāmasukham asukhato vimṛśan vijahāra tṛpta iva tatra sajjanaḥ // Saund_3.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:327: na parasya kaś cid apaghātam api ca sgṛṇo vyacintayat /
GK19asvsaunu:328: mātṛpiṛsutasuhṛsadṛśaṃ sa dadarśa tatra hi paras paraṃ janaḥ // Saund_3.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:329: niyataṃ bhaviṣyati paratra bhavad api ca bhūtam apy atho /
GK19asvsaunu:330: karmaphalam api ca lokagatir niyateti darśanam avāpa sādhu ca // Saund_3.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:332: bhraṃśini śitahilaguṇo 'pi yuge vijahāra tatra munsaṃśrayaj janaḥ // Saund_3.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:333: na ca tatra kaś cid upapattisukham abhilalāṣa tair guṇaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:334: sarvam aśivam avagamya bhavaṃ bhavasaṃkṣayāya vavṛte na janmane // Saund_3.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:336: srotasi hi vavṛtire bahavo rajasas tanutvam api cakrire pare // Saund_3.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:337: vavṛte 'tra yo 'pi viṣameṣu vibhavadṛśeṣu kaś cana /
GK19asvsaunu:338: tyāgavinayaniyamābhirato vijahāra so 'pi na cacāla satpathāt // Saund_3.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:339: api ca svato 'pi parato 'pi na bhayam abhavan na daivataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:340: tatra ca susukhasubhikṣaguṇair jahṛṣuḥ prajāḥ kṛtayuge manor iva // Saund_3.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:341: iti muditam anāmayaṃ nirāpat kururaghupurupuropamaṃ puraṃ tat /
GK19asvsaunu:342: abhavad abhayadaiśike maharṣau viharati tatra śivāya vītarāge // Saund_3.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:344: munau bruvāñe 'pi tu tatra dharmaṃ dharmaṃ prati jñātiṣu cādṛteṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:345: prāsādasaṃstho madanaikakāryaḥ priyāsahāyo vijahāra nandaḥ // Saund_4.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:346: sa cakravākyeva hi cakravākas tayā sametaḥ priyayā priyārhaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:347: nācintayad vaiśrmaṇaṃ na śakraṃ tasthānahetoḥ kuta eva dharmam // Saund_4.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:348: lakṣmyā ca rūpeṇa ca sundarīti stambhena garveṇa ca māninīti /
GK19asvsaunu:349: dīptyā ca mānena ca bhāminīti yato babhāṣe trividhena nāmnā // Saund_4.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:351: bhūyo babhāse svakuloditena strīpadminī nandadivākareṇa // Saund_4.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:353: manuṣyaloke hi tadā babhūva sā sundarī strīṣu nareṣu nandaḥ // Saund_4.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:354: sā devatā nandanacāriṇīva kulasya nandījananaś ca nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:355: atītya martyān anupetya devān sṛṣṭāv abhūtām iva bhūtadhātrā // Saund_4.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:356: tāṃ sundarīṃ cen na labheta nandaḥ sā vā niṣeveta na taṃ natabhrūḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:357: dvandaṃ dhruvaṃ tad vikalaṃ na śobhetānyonyahīnāv iva rātricandrau // Saund_4.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:358: kandarparatyor iva lakṣyabhūtaṃ pramodanāndyor iva nīḍabhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:359: praharṣatuṣṭyor iva pātrabhūtaṃ dvandaṃ sahāraṃsta madāndhabhūtam // Saund_4.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:361: parasparāśleṣahṛtāṇgarāgaṃ parasparaṃ tan mithunaṃ jahāra // Saund_4.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:363: cikrīḍatuś cābhivirejatuś ca rūpaśriyānyonyam ivākṣipantau // Saund_4.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:364: anyonyasaṃrāgavivardhanena tad dvandvam anyonyam arīramac ca /
GK19asvsaunu:365: klamāntare 'nyonyavinodanena salīlam anyonyam amīmadac ca // Saund_4.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:366: vibhūṣayām āsa tataḥ priyāṃ sa siṣeviṣus tāṃ na mṛjāvahārtham /
GK19asvsaunu:367: svenaiva rūpeṇa vibhūṣitā hi vibhūṣaṇānām api bhuṣaṇaṃ sā // Saund_4.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:368: dattvātha sā darpaṇam asya haste mamāgrato dhāraya tāvad enam /
GK19asvsaunu:369: viśeṣakaṃ yāvad ahaṃ karomīty uvāca kāntaṃ sa ca taṃ babhāra // Saund_4.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:370: bhartus tataḥ śmaśru nirīkṣamāṇā viśeṣakaṅ sāpi cakāra tādṛk /
GK19asvsaunu:371: niśvāsavātena ca darpañasya cikitsayitvā nijaghāna nandaḥ // Saund_4.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:372: sā tena ceṣṭālalitena bhartuḥ śāṭhyena cāntarmanasā jahāsa /
GK19asvsaunu:373: bhavec ca ruṣṭā kila nāma tasmai lalāṭajihmāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ cakāra // Saund_4.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:374: cikṣepa karṇotpalam asya cāṃse kareña savyena madālasena /
GK19asvsaunu:375: pattrāṅguliṃ cārdhanimīlitākṣe vaktre 'sya tām eva vinirdudhāva // Saund_4.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:377: padhyāṃ priyāyā nalinopamābhyāṃ mūrdhnā bhayān nāma nanāma nadaḥ // Saund_4.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:378: sa muktapuṣponmiṣitena mūrdhnā tataḥ priyāyāḥ priyakṛd babhāse /
GK19asvsaunu:379: suvarṇavedyām anilāvabhagnaḥ puṣpātibhārād iva nāgavṛkṣaḥ // Saund_4.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:380: sā taṃ stanodvartitahāraṣṭir utthāpayām āsa nipīḍya dorbhyām /
GK19asvsaunu:381: kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti jahāsa coccair mukhena sācīkṛtakuṇḍalena // Saund_4.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:382: patyus tato darpaṇasaktapāṇer muhurmuhur vaktram avekṣamāṇā /
GK19asvsaunu:383: tamālapattrārdratale kapole samāpayāmāsa viśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_4.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:384: tasyā mukhaṅ tat satamālapattraṅ tāmrādharauṣṭhaṃ cikurāyatākṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:385: raktādhikāgraṃ patitadvirephaṅ saśaivalaṅ padmam ivābabhāse // Saund_4.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:386: nandas tato darpaṇam ādareṇa bibhrat tadāmaṇḍanasākṣibhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:387: viśeṣakāvekṣaṇakekarākṣo laḍat priyāyā vadanaṃ dadarśa // Saund_4.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:389: nandaḥ priyāyā mukham īkṣamāṇo bhūyaḥ priyānandakaro babhūva // Saund_4.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:390: vimānakalpe sa vimānagarbhe tatas tathā caiva nandana nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:391: tathāgataś cāgatabhaikṣakālo bhaikṣāya tasya praviveṣa veśma // Saund_4.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:392: avāṅmukho niṣpraṇayaś ca tasthau bhrātu gṛhe 'nyasya gṛhe yathaiva /
GK19asvsaunu:393: tasmād atho preṣyajanapramādād bhikṣām alabdhaiva punar jagāma // Saund_4.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:394: kā cit pipeṣāṅgavilepanaṃ hi vāso 'ṅganā kā cid avāsayac ca /
GK19asvsaunu:395: ayojayat snānavidhiṃ tathānyā jagranthur anyāḥ surabhīḥ srajaś ca // Saund_4.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:396: tasmin gṛhe bhartur ataś carantyaḥ krīḍānurūpaṃ lalitaṃ niyogam /
GK19asvsaunu:397: kāś cin na buddhaṃ dadṛśur yuvatyo buddhasya vaiṣā niyataṅ manīṣā // Saund_4.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:398: kā cit sthitā tatra tu harmyapṛṣṭhe gavākṣapakṣe praṇidhāya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:399: viniṣpatantaṃ sugataṃ dadarśa payodagarbhād iva dīptam arkam // Saund_4.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:400: sā gauravaṃ tatra vicārya bhartuḥ svayā ca bhaktyārhatayārhataś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:401: nandasya tasthau purato vivakṣus tadājñayā ceti tadācacakṣe // Saund_4.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:402: anugrahāyāsya janasya śaṅke gurur gṛhaṃ no bhagavān praviṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:403: bhikṣām alabdhvā giram āsanaṃ vā sūnyād araṇyād iva yāti bhūyaḥ // Saund_4.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:404: śrutvā maharṣeḥ sa gṛhapraveśaṃ satkārahīnaṃ ca punaḥprayāṇam /
GK19asvsaunu:405: cacāla citrābharaṇāmbarasrak kalpadrumo dhūta ivānilena // Saund_4.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:406: kṛtvāñjaliṃ mūrdhani padmakalpaṃ tataḥ sa kāntāṃ gamanaṃ yayāce /
GK19asvsaunu:407: kartuṃ gamiṣyāmi gurau praṇāmaṃ mām abhyanujñātum ihārhasīti // Saund_4.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:408: sā vepamānā parisasvaje taṃ śālaṃ latā vātasamīriteva /
GK19asvsaunu:409: dadarśa cāśuplutalolanetrā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasya vaco 'bhyuvāca // Saund_4.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:410: nāhaṃ yiyāsor gurudarśanārtham arhāmi kartuṃ tava dharmapīḍām /
GK19asvsaunu:411: gacchāryaputraihi ca śīghram eva viśeṣako yāvad ayaṅ na śuṣkaḥ // Saund_4.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:412: saced bhaves tvaṃ khalu dīrghasūtro daṇdaṃ mahāntaṃ tvayi pātayeyam /
GK19asvsaunu:413: muhurmuhus tvāṃ śayitaṃ kucābhyāṃ vibodhayeyaṃ ca na cālapeyam // Saund_4.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:414: athāpy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayy eṣyasi tvaṃ tvaritaṃ tatas tvām /
GK19asvsaunu:416: ity evam uktaś ca nipīḍitaś ca tayāsavarṇasvanayā jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:417: evaṃ kariṣyāmi vimuñca caṇḍi yāvad gurur dūragato na me saḥ // Saund_4.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:418: tataḥ stanodvartitacandanābhyāṃ mukto bhujābhyāṃ na tu mānasena /
GK19asvsaunu:419: vihāya veṣaṃ madanānurūpaṃ satkārayogyaṃ sa vapur babhāra // Saund_4.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:420: sā taṃ prayāntaṃ ramaṇaṃ pradadhyau pradhyānaśūnyasthitaniścalākṣī /
GK19asvsaunu:421: sthitoccakarṇā vyapaviddhaśaṣpā bhrāntasṃ mṛgaṃ bhrāntaṃ mṛgaṅ bhrāntaṃ mukhī mṛgīva // Saund_4.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:422: didṛkṣayākṣiptamanā munes tu nandaḥ prayāṇaṃ prati tatvare ca /
GK19asvsaunu:423: vivṛttadṛṣṭiś ca śanair yayau tāṃ karīva paśyan sa laḍatkareñum // Saund_4.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:424: chātodariṃ pīnapayodharoruṃ sa sundarīṃ rukmadarīm ivādreḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:425: kākṣeṇa paśyan na tatarpa nandaḥ pibann ivaikena jalaṃ kareṇa // Saund_4.41//
GK19asvsaunu:426: taṅ gauravaṃ buddhagataṃ cakarṣa bhāryānurāgaḥ punar ācakarṣa /
GK19asvsaunu:427: sa 'niścayān nāpi yayau na tasthau turaṃs taraṅgeṣv iva rājahaṃsaḥ // Saund_4.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:428: adarśanaṃ tūpagataś ca tasyā harmyāt tataś cāvatatāra tūrṇam /
GK19asvsaunu:429: śrutvā tato nūpuranisvanaṃ sa punar lalambe hṛdaye gṛhītaḥ // Saund_4.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:430: sa kāmarāgeña nigṛhyamāṇo dharmānurāgeña ca kṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:431: jagāma duḥkhena vivartyamānaḥ plavaḥ pratisrota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_4.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:432: tataḥ kramair dīrghatamaiḥ pracakrame kataṃ nu yāto na gurur bhaved iti /
GK19asvsaunu:433: svajeya tāṃ caiva viśeṣakapriyāṃ kathaṃ priyām ārdraviśeṣakām iti // Saund_4.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:434: atha sa pathi dadarśa muktamānaṃ pitṛnagare 'pi tathāgatābhimānam /
GK19asvsaunu:435: daśabalam abhito vilambamānaṃ dhvajam anuyāna ivaindram arcyamānam // Saund_4.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:436: Saundaranande mahākāvye bhāryāyācitako nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:439: mahāpaṇebhyo vyavahāriṇaś ca mahāmunau bhaktivaśāt praṇemuḥ // Saund_5.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:440: ke cit praṇamyānuyayur mhūrtaṅ ke cit praṇamyārthavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:441: ke cit svakeṣv āvastheṣu tastuḥ kṛtvāñjalīn vikṣaṇatatparākṣāḥ // Saund_5.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:442: buddhas tatas tatra narendramārga sroto mahadbhaktimato janasya /
GK19asvsaunu:443: jagāma duūkhena vigāhamāno jalāgame srota ivāpagāyāḥ // Saund_5.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:444: atho mahadbhiḥ pathi saṃpatadbhiḥ saṃpūjyamānāya tathāgatāya /
GK19asvsaunu:445: kartuṃ prañāmaṃ na śaśāka nandas tenābhireme tu guror mahimnā // Saund_5.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:446: svaṃ cāvasaṅgaṃ pathi nirmumukṣur bhaktiṃ janasyānyamateś ca rakṣan /
GK19asvsaunu:447: nandaṃ ca gehābhimukhaṃ jighṛkṣan mārgaṃ tato 'nyaṃ sugataḥ prapede // Saund_5.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:448: tato viviktaṃ ca viviktacetāḥ sanmārgavin mārgam abhipratasthe /
GK19asvsaunu:449: gatvāgrataś cāgryatamāya tasmai nāndīvimuktāya nanāma nadnaḥ // Saund_5.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:450: śanair vrjann eva sa gauraveṇa paṭāvṛtāṃso vinatārdhakāyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:451: adhonibaddhāñjalir ūrdhvanetraḥ sagadgadaṃ vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe // Saund_5.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:453: atas tvarāvān aham abhyupeto gṛhasya kakṣyāmahato 'bhasūyan // Saund_5.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:454: tat sādhu sādhupriya matpriyārthaṃ tatrāstu bikṣūttama bhaikṣakālsaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:455: asau hi madhyaṃ nabhaso yiyāsuḥ kālaṃ pratismārayatīva sūryaḥ // Saund_5.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:456: ity evam uktaḥ praṇatena tena snehābhimānonmukhalocanena /
GK19asvsaunu:457: tādṛṅnimittaṃ sugataś cakāra nāhārakṛtyaṃ sa yathā viveda // Saund_5.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:458: tataḥ sa kṛtvā munaye praṇāmaṃ gṛhaprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsaunu:459: anugrahārthaṃ sugatas tu tasmai pātraṃ dadau puṣkarapattranetraḥ // Saund_5.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:460: tataḥ sa loke dadataḥ phalārthaṃ pātrasya tasyāpratimasya pātram /
GK19asvsaunu:461: jagrāha cāpagrahaṇakṣaṃābhyāṃ padmopamābhyāṃ prayataḥ karābhyām // Saund_5.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:462: parāṅmukhas tv anyamanaskam ārād vijñāya nandaḥ sugataṃ gatāstham /
GK19asvsaunu:463: hastasthapātro 'pi gṛha yiyāsuḥ sasāra mārgān munim īkṣamāṇaḥ // Saund_5.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:464: bhāryānurāgeṇa yadā gṛhaṃ sa pātraṃ gṛhītvāpi yiyāsur eva /
GK19asvsaunu:465: vimohayām āsa munis tatas taṃ rathyāmukhasyāvaraṇena tasya // Saund_5.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:466: nirmokṣabījaṃ hi dadarśa tasya jñanaṃ mṛdu kleśarajaś ca tīvram /
GK19asvsaunu:467: kleśānukūlaṃ viṣayātmakaṅ ca nandaṃ yatas taṃ munir ācakarṣa // Saund_5.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:468: saṃkleśapakṣo dvividhaś ca dṛṣṭas tathā dvikalpo vyavadānapakṣaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:470: ayatnato hetubalādhikas tu nirmucyate ghaṭṭitamātra eva /
GK19asvsaunu:471: yatnena tu pratyayaneyabuddhir vimokṣam āpnoti parāśrayeṇa // Saund_5.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:472: nandaḥ sa ca pratyayaneyacetā yaṃ śiśriye tanmayatām avāpa /
GK19asvsaunu:473: yasmād imaṃ tatra cakāra yatnaṃ taṃ snehapaṅkān munir ujjihīrṣam // Saund_5.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:474: nandas tu duḥkhena viceṣṭamānaḥ śanair agatyā gurum anvagacchat /
GK19asvsaunu:475: bhāryāmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇalolanetraṃ vicintayann ādraviśeṣakaṃ tat // Saund_5.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:476: tato munis taṃ priyamālyahāraṃ vasantamāsena kṛtābhihāram /
GK19asvsaunu:478: dīnaṃ mahākāruṇikas tatas taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:479: kareṇa cakdrāṅkatalena mūrdhni pasparśa caivedam uvāca cainam // Saund_5.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:480: yāvan na hiṃsraḥ samupaiti kālaḥ śamāya tāvat kuru saumya buddhim /
GK19asvsaunu:481: sarvāsv avasthāsv iha vartamānaḥ sarvābhisāreṇa nihanti mṛtyuḥ // Saund_5.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:482: sādhāraṇāt svapnanibhādasārāl lolaṃ manaḥ kāmasukhān niyaccha /
GK19asvsaunu:483: havyair ivāgneḥ pavaneritasya lokasya kāmair na hi tṛptir asti // Saund_5.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:484: śraddhādhanaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ dhanebhyaḥ prajñārasas tṛptir rasebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:485: pradhānamadhyātmasukhaṃ sukhebhyo vidyāratir duḥkhatatmā ratibhyaḥ // Saund_5.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:486: hitasya vaktā pravaraḥ suṛdbhyo dharmāya khedo guṇavān śramebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:487: jñānāya kṛtyaṃ paramaṃ kriyābhyaḥ kim indriyāṇām upagamya dāsyam // Saund_5.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:488: tan niścitaṃ bhīklamaśugviyuktaṃ pareṣv anāyattam ahāryam anyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:489: nityaṃ śivaṃ śāntisukhaṃ vṛṇīṣva kim indriyārthārtham anartham ūḍhvā // Saund_5.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:490: jarāsamā nāsty amṛjā prajānāṃ vyādheḥ samo nāsti jagaty anarthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:491: mṛtyoḥ samaṃ nāsti bhayaṃ pṛthivyām etat trayaṃ khalv avaśena sevyam // Saund_5.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:492: snehena kaś cin na samo 'sti pāśaḥ sroto na tṛṇāsamam asti hāri /
GK19asvsaunu:493: rāgāgninā nāsti samas tathāgnis tac cet trayaṃ nāsti sukhaṃ ca te 'sti // Saund_5.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:494: avaśyabhāvi priyaviprayogas tasmāc ca śoko niyataṃ viṣevyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:495: śokena conmādam upeyivāṃso rājarṣayo 'nye 'py avaśā viceluḥ // Saund_5.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:496: prajñāmayaṃ varma badhāna tasmān no kṣāntinighnasya hi śokabāṇāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:497: mahac ca dagdhuṃ bhavakakṣajālaṃ saṃdhukṣayālpāgnim ivātmatejaḥ // Saund_5.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:498: yathauṣadhair hastagataiḥ savidyo na daśyate kaś cana pannagena /
GK19asvsaunu:499: tathānapekṣo jitalokamoho na daśyate śokabhujaṅgamena // Saund_5.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:500: āsthāya yogaṃ parigamya tattvaṃ na trāsam āgacchati mṛtyukāle /
GK19asvsaunu:501: ābaddhavarmā sudhanuḥ kṛtāstro jigīṣayā śūra ivāhavasthaḥ // Saund_5.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:502: ity evam uktaḥ sa tathāgatena sarveṣu bhūteṣv anukampakena /
GK19asvsaunu:503: dhṛṣṭaṃ girāntarhṛdayena sīdaṃs tatheti nandaḥ sugataṃ babhāṣe // Saund_5.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:504: atha pramādāc ca tam ujjihīrṣan matvāgamasyaiva ca pātrabhūtam /
GK19asvsaunu:505: pravrājayānanda śamāya nandam ity abravīn maitramanā maharṣiḥ // Saund_5.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:506: nandaṃ tato 'ntarmanasā rudantam ehīti vaidehamunir jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:507: śanais tatas taṃ samupetya nando na pravrajiṣyāmy aham ity uvāca // Saund_5.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:508: śrutvātha nandasya manīṣitaṃ tad buddhāya vaidehamuniḥ śaśaṃsa /
GK19asvsaunu:509: saṃśrutya tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:510: mayy agraje pravrajite 'jitātman bhrātṣṛv anupravrajiteṣu cāsmān /
GK19asvsaunu:511: jñātīṃś tasmād api tasya bhāvaṃ mahāmunir nandam uvāca bhūyaḥ // Saund_5.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:512: rājarṣayas te viditā na nūnaṃ vanāni ye śiśriyire hasantaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:513: niṣṭhīvya kāmān upaśāntikāmāḥ kāmeṣu naivaṃ kṛpaṇeṣu saktāḥ // Saund_5.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:514: bhūyaḥ samālokya gṛheṣu doṣān niśāmya tattyāgakṛtaṃ ca śarma /
GK19asvsaunu:515: naivāsti moktuṃ maitrālayaṃ te deśaṃ mumūrṣor iva sopasargam // Saund_5.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:516: saṃsārakāntāraparāyaṇasya śive kathaṃ te pathi nārurukṣā /
GK19asvsaunu:517: āropyamāṇasya tam eva mārgaṃ bhraṣṭasya sārthād iva sārthikasya // Saund_5.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:518: yaḥ sarvato veśmani dahyamāne śayita mohān na tato vyapeyāt /
GK19asvsaunu:519: kālāgninā vyādhijarāśikhena loke pradīpte sa bhavet pramattaḥ // Saund_5.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:520: prañīyamānaś ca yathā vadhāya matto hasec ca pralapec ca vadhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:521: mṛtyau tathā tiṣṭhati pāśahaste śocyaḥ pramādyan viparītacetāḥ // Saund_5.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:522: yadā narendrāś ca kuṭumbinaś ca vihāya badhūṃś ca parigrahāṃś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:523: yayuś ca yāsyanti ca yānti caiva priyeṣv anityeṣv kuto 'nurodhaḥ // Saund_5.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:524: kiṃ cin na paśyāmi ratasya yatra tad anyabhāvena bhaven na duḥkham /
GK19asvsaunu:525: tasmāt kva cin na kṣamate prasktir yadi kṣamas tadvigamān na śokaḥ // Saund_5.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:526: tat saumya lolaṃ parigamya lokaṃ māyopamaṃ citram ivendrajālam /
GK19asvsaunu:527: priyābhidhāntaṃ tayja mohajālaṃ chettuṃ matis te yadi duḥkhajālam // Saund_5.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:528: varaṃ hitodarkam aniṣṭam annaṃ na svādu yat syād ahitānubaddham /
GK19asvsaunu:529: yasmād ahaṃ tvā viniyojayāmi śive śucau vartmani vipriye 'pi // Saund_5.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:530: bālasya dhārtrī vinigṛhya loṣṭaṃ yathoddharaty āsyapuṭapraviṣṭam /
GK19asvsaunu:531: tathojjihīrṣuḥ khalu rāgaśalyaṃ tat tvām avocaṃ paruṣaṃ hitāya // Saund_5.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:532: aniṣṭam apy auṣadham āturāya dadāti vaidyaś ca yathā nigṛhya /
GK19asvsaunu:533: tadvan mayoktaṃ pratikūlam etat tubhyaṃ hitodarkam anugrahāya // Saund_5.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:534: tad yāvad eva kṣañasaṃnipāto na mṛtyur āgacchati yāvad eva /
GK19asvsaunu:535: yāvad vayo yogavidhau samarthaṃ buddhiṃ kuru śreyasi tāvad eva // Saund_5.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:536: ity evam uktaḥ sa vināyakena hitaiṣinā kāruṇikena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:537: kartāsmi sarvaṃ bhagavan vacas te tathā yathājñāpaysīty uvāca // Saund_5.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:538: ādāya vaidehamunis tatas taṃ nināya saṃśliṣya viceṣṭamānam /
GK19asvsaunu:539: vyayojayac cāsrupariplutākṣaṃ keśaśriyaṃ chattranibhasya mūrdhnaḥ // Saund_5.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:540: atho nataṃ tasya mukhaṃ sabāṣpaṃ pravāsyamāneṣu śiroruheṣu /
GK19asvsaunu:541: vakrāgranālaṃ nalinaṃ taḍāge varṣodakalinnam ivābabhāse // Saund_5.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:542: nandas tatas tarukaṣāyaviraktavāsāś cintāvaśo navagṛhita iva dvipendraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:543: pūrṇaḥ śaśī bahulapakṣagataḥ kṣapānte bālātpena pariṣikta ivābabhāse // Saund_5.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:544: Saundaranande mahākāvye nandapravrājano nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:546: tato hṛte bhartari gauraveṇa prītau hṛtāyām aratau kṛtāyām /
GK19asvsaunu:547: tatraiva harmyopari vartamānā na sundarī saiva tadā babhāse // Saund_6.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:548: sā bhartur abhyāgamanapratīkṣā gavākṣam ākramya payodharābhyām /
GK19asvsaunu:549: dvāronmukhī calayoktrakā lalambe mukhena tiryaṅnatakuṇḍalena // Saund_6.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:550: vilambhaārā calayoktrakā sā tasmād vimānād vinatā cakāśe /
GK19asvsaunu:551: tapaḥksayād apsarasāṃ vareva cyutaṃ vimānāt priyam īkṣamāṇā // Saund_6.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:553: cintācalākṣeṇa mukhena tasthau bartāram anyatra viśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:555: tiryak ca śiśye pravikīrṇahārā sapādukaikārthavilambapādā // Saund_6.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:556: athātra kā cit pramadā sabāṣpāṃ tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ draṣṭum anīpsamānā /
GK19asvsaunu:557: prāsādasopānatalapraṇādaṃ cakāra padbhyāṃ sahasā rudantī // Saund_6.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:558: tasyāś ca sopānatalapraṇādaṃ śrutaiva tūrṇaṃ punar utpapāta /
GK19asvsaunu:559: prītyā prasaktaiva ca saṃjaharṣa priyopayānaṃ pariśaṅkamānā // Saund_6.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:561: sopānakukṣiṅ prasasāra harṣād bhraṣṭaṃ dukūlāntam acintayantī // Saund_6.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:562: tām aṅganāṃ prekṣya ca vipralabdhā niśvasya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ prapede /
GK19asvsaunu:563: vivarṇavaktrā na rarāja cāśu vivarṇacandreva himāgame dyauḥ // Saund_6.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:564: sā duḥkhitā bhartur adarśanena kāmena kopena ca dahyamānā /
GK19asvsaunu:565: kṛtvā kare vaktram upopaviṣṭā cintānadīṃ śokajalāṃ tatāra // Saund_6.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:566: tasyā mukhaṃ padmasapatnabhūtaṃ pāṇau sthitaṅ pallavarāgatāmre /
GK19asvsaunu:567: chāyāmayasyāmbhasi paṅkajasya babhau nataṃ padmam ivopariṣṭāt // Saund_6.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:568: sā strīsvabhāvena vicintya tat tad dṛṣṭānurāge 'bhimukhe 'pi patyau /
GK19asvsaunu:569: dharmāśrite tattvam avindamānā saṃkalpya tat tad vilalāpa tat tat // Saund_6.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:570: eṣyāmy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ tvayīti kṛtvā mayi tāṃ pratijñām /
GK19asvsaunu:571: kasmān nu hetor dayitapratijñaḥ so 'dya priya me vitathapratijñaḥ // Saund_6.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:573: kuto vikāro 'yam abhūtapūrvaḥ svenāparāgeṇa mamāpacārāt // Saund_6.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:574: ratipriyasya priyavartino me priyasya nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ viraktam /
GK19asvsaunu:575: tathāpi rāgo yadi tasya hi syān maccittarakṣī na sa nāgataḥ syāt // Saund_6.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:576: rūpeṇa bhāvena ca madviśiṣtā priyeṇa dṛṣṭā niyataṃ tato 'nyā /
GK19asvsaunu:577: tathā hi kṛtvā mayi moghasāntvaṃ lagnāṃ satīṃ mām agamad vihāya // Saund_6.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:578: bhaktiṃ sa buddhaṃ prati yām avocat tasya prayātuṃ mayi sopadeśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:579: munau prasādo yadi tasya hi syān mṛtyor ivogrād anṛtād bibhīyāt // Saund_6.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:580: lekārtham ādarśanam anyacitto vibhūṣayantya mama dhārayitvā /
GK19asvsaunu:581: bibharti so 'nyasya janasya taṅ cen namo 'stu tasmai calasauhṛdāya // Saund_6.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:582: necchanti yāḥ śokam avāptum evaṃ śraddhātum arhanti na tā narāṇām /
GK19asvsaunu:583: kva cānuvṛttir mayi sāsya pūrvaṃ tyāgaḥ kva cāyaṃ janavat kṣaṇena // Saund_6.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:584: ity evamādi priyaviprakutā priye 'nyad āśaṅkya ca sā jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:585: saṃbhrāntam āruhya ca tad vimānaṃ tāṃ strī sabāṣpā giram ity uvāca // Saund_6.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:587: yas tvāṃ priyo nābhyacarat kadā cit tam anyathā yāsyatikātarāsi // Saund_6.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:588: mā svāminaṃ svāmini doṣato gāḥ priyaṃ priyārhaṃ priyakāriṇaṃ tam /
GK19asvsaunu:589: na sa tvad anyāṃ pramadām avaiti svacakravākyā iva cakravākaḥ // Saund_6.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:590: sa tu tvadarthaṃ gṛhavāsam īpsan jijīviṣus tvatparitoṣahetoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:591: bhrātrā kilāryeṇa tathāgatena pravrājito netrajalārdravaktraḥ // Saund_6.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:592: śrutvā tato bhartari tāṃ pravṛttiṃ savepathuḥ sā sahasotpapāta /
GK19asvsaunu:593: pragṛhya bāhū virurāva coccair hṛdīva digdhābhihatā kareṇuḥ // Saund_6.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:595: papāta śīrṇākulahārayaṣṭiḥ phalātibhārād iva cūtayaṣṭiḥ // Saund_6.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:596: sā padmarāgaṃ vasanaṃ vasānā padmānanā padmadalāyatākṣī /
GK19asvsaunu:597: padmā vipadmā patiteva lakṣmīḥ śuśoṣa padmasrag ivātapena // Saund_6.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:598: saṃcintya saṃcintya guṇāṃś ca bhartur dīrghaṃ niśaśavāsa tatāma caiva /
GK19asvsaunu:599: vibhūṣaśrīnihite prakoṣṭhe tāmre karāgre ca vinirdudhāva // Saund_6.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:600: na bhuṣaṇārtho mama saṃpratīti sā dikṣu cikṣepa vibhūṣaṇāni /
GK19asvsaunu:601: nirbhuṣaṇā sā patitā cakāśe viśīrṇapuṣpastabakā lateva // Saund_6.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:602: dhṛtaḥ priyeṇāyam abhūn mameti rukmatsaruṃ darpaṇam āliliṅge /
GK19asvsaunu:603: yatnāc ca vinyastatamālapattrau ruṣṭeva dhṛṣṭaṃ pramamārja gaṇḍau // Saund_6.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:607: rukmāṅgapāde śayane mahārhe na śarma lebhe pariceṣṭamānā // Saund_6.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:608: saṃdṛṣya bhartuś ca vibhūṣañāni vāsāṃsi vīṇāprabhṛtiṃś ca līlāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:609: tamo viveśābhinanāda coccaiḥ paṅkāvatīrṇeva ca saṃsasāda // Saund_6.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:611: śokāgnināntardhṛdi dahyamānā vibhrāntacitteva tadā babhūva // Saund_6.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:612: ruroda mamlau virurāva jaglau babhrāma tasthau vilalāpa dadhyau /
GK19asvsaunu:613: cakāra roṣaṃ vicakāra mālyaṃ cakarta vaktraṃ vicakarṣa vastram // Saund_6.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:614: tāṃ cārudantīṃ prasabhaṃ rudantīṃ saṃśrutya nāryaḥ paramābhitaptāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:615: antargṛhād āruruhur vimānaṃ trāsena kiṃnarya ivādripṛṣṭham // Saund_6.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:616: bāṣpeṇa tāḥ klinnaviṣaṇṇavaktrā varṣeṇa padminya ivārdrapadmāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:617: sthānānurūpeṇa yathābhimānaṃ nililyire tām anu dahyamānāḥ // Saund_6.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:618: tābhir vṛtā harmyatale 'ṅganābhiś cintātanuḥ sā sutanur babhāse /
GK19asvsaunu:620: yā tatra tāsāṃ vacasopapannā mānyā ca tasyā vayasādhikā ca /
GK19asvsaunu:621: sā pṛṣṭhatas tāṃ tu samāliliṅge pramṛhya cāśrūṇi vacāṃsy uvāca // Saund_6.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:622: rājarṣivadhvās tava nānurūpo dharmāśrite bhartari jātu śokaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:623: ikṣvākuvaṃśe hy abhikāṅkṣitāni dāyādyabhūtāni tapovanāni // Saund_6.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:624: prāyeṇa mokṣāya viniḥsṛtānāṃ śākyarṣabhāṇāṃ viditāḥ striyas te /
GK19asvsaunu:625: tapovanānīva gṛhāṇi yāsāṃ sādhvīvrataṃ kāmavadāsritānām // Saund_6.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:626: yady anyayā rūpaguṇādhikatvād bhartā hṛtas te kuru bāṣpamokṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:627: manasvinī rūpavatī guṇādhyā hṛdi kṣate kātra hi nāśru muñcet // Saund_6.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:628: athāpi kiṃ cid vyasanaṃ prapanno mā caiva tad bhūt sadṛśo 'tra bāṣpaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:629: ato viśiṣṭaṃ na hi duḥkham asti kulodgatāyāḥ patidevatāyāḥ // Saund_6.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:630: atha tv idānīṃ laḍitaḥ sukhena svasthaḥ phalastho vyasnāny adṛṣtvā /
GK19asvsaunu:631: vītaspṛho dharmam anuprapannaḥ kiṃ viklave rodiṣi harṣakāle // Saund_6.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:632: ity evam uktāpi bahuprakāraṃ snehāt tayā naiva dhṛtiṃ cakāra /
GK19asvsaunu:633: athāparā tāṃ manaso 'nukūlaṃ kālopapannaṃ praṇayād uvāca // Saund_6.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:634: bravīmi satyaṃ suviniścitaṃ me prāptaṃ priyaṃ drakṣyasi śīghram eva /
GK19asvsaunu:635: tvayā vinā sthāsyati tatra nāsau sattvāṣrayaś cetanayeva hīnaḥ // Saund_6.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:636: aṅke 'pi lakṣmyā na sa nirvṛtaḥ syāt tvaṃ tasya pārśve yadi tatra na syāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:637: āpatsu kṛcchrāsv api cāgatāsu tvāṃ paśyatas tasya bhaven na duḥkham // Saund_6.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:638: tvaṃ nirvṛtiṃ gaccha niyaccha bāṣpaṃ taptāśrumokṣāt parirakṣa cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:639: yas tasya bhāvas tvayi yaś ca rāgo na raṃsyate tvadvirahāt sa dharme // Saund_6.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:640: syād atra nāsau kulasattvagoyāt kāṣāyam ādāya vihāsyatīti /
GK19asvsaunu:641: anātmanādāya gṛhonmukhasya punar vimoktuṃ ka ivāsti doṣaḥ // Saund_6.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:642: ity yuvatijanena sāntvyamānā hṛtahṛdayā ramaṇena sundarī sā /
GK19asvsaunu:643: dramiḍam abhimukhī pureva rambhā kṣitim agamat parivāritāpsarobhiḥ // Saund_6.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:644: Saundaranande mahākāvye bhāryāvilāpo nāma ṣaṣṭaḥ sargah //
GK19asvsaunu:646: liṅgaṃ tataḥ śāstṛvidhipradiṣṭaṃ gātreṇa bibhran na tu cetasā tat /
GK19asvsaunu:647: bhāryāgatair eva manovitakair jehrīyamāṇo na nananda nandaḥ // Saund_7.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:648: sa puṣpamāsasya ca puṣpalakṣmyā sarvābhisāreṇa ca puṣpaketoḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:649: yānīyabhāvena ca yauvanasya vihārasaṃstho na śamaṃ jagāma // Saund_7.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:651: bhṛśaṃ jajṛmbhe yugadīrghabāhur dhyātvā priyāṃ cāpam ivācakarṣa // Saund_7.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:652: sa pitakṣodam iva pratīcchan cūtadrumbheyas tanupuṣpavarṣam /
GK19asvsaunu:653: dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa vicintya bhāryāṃ navagraho nāga ivāvaruddhaḥ // Saund_7.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:654: śokasya hartā śaraṇāgatānāṃ śokasya kartā pratigarvitānām /
GK19asvsaunu:655: aśokam ālambya sa jātaśokaḥ priyāṃ priyāśokavanāṃ śuśoca // Saund_7.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:656: priyāṃ priyāyāḥ pratanuṃ priyaṇguṃ niśāmya bhītām iva niṣpatantim /
GK19asvsaunu:657: sasmāra tām aśrumukhīṃ sabāṣpaḥ priyāṃ priyaṅguprasavāvadātām // Saund_7.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:659: saṃkalpayām āsa śikhāṃ priyāyāḥ śuklāṃśuke 'ṭṭālam apāsritāyāḥ // Saund_7.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:660: latāṃ praphullām atimuktakasya cūtasya pārśve parirabhya jātām /
GK19asvsaunu:661: niśāmya cintām agamat tadaivaṃ śliṣṭābhavan mām api sundarīti // Saund_7.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:662: puṣpotkarālā api nāgavṛkṣā dāntaiḥ samudgair iva hemagarbhaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:663: kāntāravṛkṣā iva duḥkhitasya na cakṣur ācikṣipur asya tatra // Saund_7.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:664: gandhaṃ vasanto 'pi ca gandhaparṇā gandharvaveṣyā iva gandhapūrṇāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:665: tasyānyacittasya śugātmakasya ghrāṇaṃ na jahrur hṛdayaṃ pratepuḥ // Saund_7.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:666: saṃraktakaṇṭhaiś ca vinīlakaṇṭhais tuṣṭaiḥ prahṛṣṭair api cānyapuṣṭaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:667: lelihyamānaiś ca madhu dvirepaiḥ svanadvanaṃ tasya mano nunoda // Saund_7.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:669: kāmāgnināntarhṛdi dahyamāno vihāya dhairyaṃ vilalāpa tat tat // Saund_7.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:670: adyāvagacchāmi suduṣkaraṃ te cakruḥ kariṣyanti ca kurvate ca /
GK19asvsaunu:671: tyaktvā priyām aśrumukhīṃ tapo ye ceruś cariṣyanti caranti caiva // Saund_7.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:672: tāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam asti loke na dāravaṃ tāntavam āyasaṃ vā /
GK19asvsaunu:673: yāvad dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam etad eva mukhaṃ calśkṣaṃ lalitaṃ ca vākyam // Saund_7.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:674: chittvā ca bhittvā ca hi yānti tāni svapauruṣāc caiva suhṛdbalāc ca /
GK19asvsaunu:675: jñānāc ca raukṣyāc ca vinā vimoktuṃ na śakyate snehamayas tu pāśaḥ // Saund_7.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:676: jñānaṃ na me tac ca śamāya yat syān na cāsti raukṣyaṃ karuṇātmako 'smi /
GK19asvsaunu:677: kāmātmakaś cāsmi guruś ca buddhaḥ sthito 'ntare cakragater ivāsmi // Saund_7.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:678: ahaṃ gṛhītvāpi hi bhikṣuliṅgaṃ bhrātṝṣiṇā dvirguruṇānuśiṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:679: sarvāsv avasthāsu labhe na śāntiṃ priyāviyogād iva cakravākaḥ // Saund_7.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:680: adyāpi tan me hṛdi vartate ca yad darpaṇe vyākulite mayā sā /
GK19asvsaunu:681: kṛtānṛtakrodhakam abravīn māṃ kathaṃ kṛto 'sīti śaṭhaṃ hasantī // Saund_7.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:682: yathaiṣy anāśyānaviśeṣakāyāṃ mayīti yan mām avadac ca sāśru /
GK19asvsaunu:683: pāriplavākṣeṇa mukhena bālā tan me vaco 'dyāpi mano ruṇaddhi // Saund_7.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:684: baddhvāsanaṃ parvatanirjharasthaḥ svastho yathā dhyāyati bhikṣur eṣaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:685: saktaḥ kva cin nāham ivaiṣa nūnaṃ śāntas tathā tṛpta ivopaviṣṭaḥ // Saund_7.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:686: puṃskokilānām avicintya ghoṣaṃ vasantalakṣmyām avicārya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:687: śāstraṃ yathābhyasyati caiṣa yuktaḥ śaṅke priyākarṣati nāsya cetaḥ // Saund_7.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:690: nirīkṣamāṇāya jalaṃ sapadmaṃ vanaṃ ca phullaṃ parapuṣṭajuṣṭam /
GK19asvsaunu:691: kasyāsti dhairyaṃ navayauvanasya māse madhau dharmasapatnabhūte // Saund_7.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:692: bhāvena garveṇa gatena lakṣmyā smitena kopena madena vāgbhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:693: jahruḥ striyo devanṛparṣisaṃghān kasmād dhi nāsmadvidham āṣipeyuḥ // Saund_7.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:694: kāmābhibhūto hi hiraṇyaretāḥ svāhāṃ siṣeve maghavān ahalyām /
GK19asvsaunu:695: sattvena sargeña ca tena hīnaḥ strīnirjitaḥ kiṃ bata mānuṣo 'ham // Saund_7.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:696: sūryaḥ saraṇyūṃ prati jātarāgas tatprītaye taṣṭa iti śrutaṃ naḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:697: yām aśvabhūto 'śvavadhuṃ sametya yato 'śvinau tau janayāṃ babhūva // Saund_7.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:699: bahūni varṣāṇi babhūva yuddhaṃ kaḥ strīnimittaṃ na caled ihānyaḥ // Saund_7.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:700: bheje śvapākīṃ munir akṣamālāṃ kāmād vaiṣṭhaś ca sa sadvariṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:701: yasyāṃ vivasvān iva bhūjalādaḥ sutaḥ prasūto 'sya kapiñjalādaḥ // Saund_7.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:702: parāśaḥ śāpaśaras taharṣiḥ kālīṃ siṣeve jhaṣagarbhayonim /
GK19asvsaunu:703: suto 'sya yasyāṃ suṣuve mahātmā dvaipāyano vedavibhāgakartā // Saund_7.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:704: dvaipāyano dharmaparāyañaś ca reme samaṃ kāśiṣu veśyavadhva /
GK19asvsaunu:705: yayā hato 'bhūc calanūpureña pādena vidyullatayeva meghaḥ // Saund_7.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:707: sārasvato yatra suto 'sya jajñe naṣṭasya vedasya punaḥpravaktā // Saund_7.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:708: tathā nṛparṣer dilipasya yajñe svargastriyāṃ kāśyapa āgatāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:709: srucaṃ gṛhītvā sravad ātmatejaś cikṣepa vahnāv asito yato 'bhūt // Saund_7.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:710: tathāṅgado 'ntaṃ tapaso 'pi gatvā kāmābhibhūto yamunām agacchat /
GK19asvsaunu:711: dhīmattaraṃ yatra rahītaraṃ sa sāraṅgajuṣṭaṃ janayāṃ babhūva // Saund_7.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:712: niśāmya śāntāṃ naradevakanyāṃ vane 'pi śānte 'pi ca vartamānaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:713: cacāla dhairyān munir ṛṣyaṣṛṅgaḥ śailo mahīkampa ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ // Saund_7.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:714: brahmarṣibhāvārtham apāsya rājyaṃ bheje vanaṃ yo viṣayeṣv anāsthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:715: sa gādhijaś cāpahṛto ghṛtācyā samā daśaikaṃ divasaṃ viveda // Saund_7.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:716: tathaiva kandarpaśarābhimṛṣṭo rambhāṃ prati stuḥilaśirā mumūrcha /
GK19asvsaunu:717: yaḥ kāmaroṣātmatayānapekṣaḥ śaśāpa tām apratigṛhyamāṇaḥ // Saund_7.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:719: saṃdṛśya saṃdṛśya jaghāna sarpān priyaṃ na roṣeṇa tapo rarakṣa // Saund_7.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:720: naptā śaśāṅkasya yaśoguṇāṅko budhasya sūnur vibhudhaprabhāvaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:721: tathorvaśīm apsarasaṃ vicintya rājarṣir unmādam agacchad aiḍaḥ // Saund_7.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:722: rakto girer mūrdhani menakāyāṃ kāmātmakatvāc ca sa tāljaṅghaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:723: pādena viśvāvasunā saroṣaṃ vajreṇa hintāla ivābhijaghne // Saund_7.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:725: jahnuś ca gaṅgāṃ nṛpatir bhujābhyāṃ rurodha maināka ivācalendraḥ // Saund_7.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:726: nṛpaś ca gaṅgāvirahāj jughūrṇa gaṅgāmbhasā sāla ivāttamūlaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:727: kulapradīpaḥ pratipasya sūnuḥ śrīmattanuḥ śantanur asvatantraḥ // Saund_7.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:728: hṛtāṃ ca saunandakinānuśocan prāptām invorvīṃ striyam urvaśīṃ tām /
GK19asvsaunu:729: sadvṛttavarmā kila somavarmā babhrāma cittodhavabhinnavarmā // Saund_7.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:730: bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ cānumamāra rājā bhīmaprabhāvo bhuvi bhīmakaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:731: balena senāka iti prakāśaḥ senāpatir deva ivāttasenaḥ // Saund_7.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:732: svargaṃ gate bhartari śantanau ca kālīṃ jihirṣan janamejayaḥ saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:733: avāpa bhīṣmāt samavetya mṛtyuṃ na tadgataṃ manmhatham utsasarje // Saund_7.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:734: śaptaś ca pāṇḍur madanena nūnaṃ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:735: jagāma mādrīṃ na maharṣiśāpād asevyasevī vimamarśa mṛtyum // Saund_7.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:736: evaṃvidhā devanṛparṣisaṅghaḥ strīṇāṃ vaśaṃ kāmavaśena jagmuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:737: dhiyā ca sāreṇa ca durbalaḥ san priyām apaśyan kimu viklavo 'ham // Saund_7.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:738: yāsyāmi tasmād gṛham eva bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ kariṣye vidhivat sakāmam /
GK19asvsaunu:739: na hy anyacittasya calendriyasya liṅgaṃ kṣamaṃ dharmapathāc cyutasya // Saund_7.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:740: pāṇau kapālam avadhāya vidhāya mauṇḍyaṃ māna nidhāya vikṛtaṃ paridhāya vāsaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:741: yasyoyoddhavo na dhṛtir asti na śānti asti citrapradīpa iva so 'sti ca nāsti caiva // Saund_7.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:742: yo niḥsṛtaś ca na ca niḥsṛtakāmarāgaḥ kāṣāyam udvahati yo na ca niṣkasāyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:743: pātraṃ bibharti ca guṇair na ca pātrabhūto kiṅgaṃ vahann api sa naiva gṛhī na bhikṣuḥ // Saund_7.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:744: na nyāyyam anvayavataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ bhūyo vimoktum iti yo 'pi hi me vicāraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:745: so 'pi praṇaśyati vicintya nṛpapravīrāṃs tān ye tapovanaṃ apāsya gṛhāṇy atīyuḥ // Saund_7.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:746: śālvādhipo hi sasuto 'pi tathāmbarīṣo rāmo 'ndhva eva sa ca sāṃkṛtir antidevaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:747: cīrāṇy apāsya dadhire punar aṃśukāni chittvā jaṭāṣ ca kuṭilā mukuṭāni babhruḥ // Saund_7.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:748: tasmād bhikṣārthaṃ mama gurur ito yāvad eva prayātas tyaktvā kāṣāyaṃ gṛham aham itas tāvad eva prayāsye /
GK19asvsaunu:749: pūjyaṃ liṅgaṃ hi skalitamanaso bibhrataḥ kliṣṭabuddher nāmutrārthaḥ syād upahatamater nāpy ayaṃ jīvalokaḥ // Saund_7.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:750: Saundarananda mahākāvye nandivlāpo nāma saptamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:753: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaś cid uvāca maitrayā // Saund_8.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:754: kim idaṃ mukham aśrudurinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:755: dhṛtim ehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaś ca śamaś ca śobhate // Saund_8.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:756: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:757: śrutavidhyupacārakovidā dvividhā eva tayoś cikitsakāḥ // Saund_8.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:758: tad iyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇam anūnam ucyatām /
GK19asvsaunu:759: viniguhya hi rogam āturo nacirāt tīvram anartham ṛcchati // Saund_8.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:760: atha duḥkham idaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yad atra bheṣajam /
GK19asvsaunu:761: manaso hi rajastamasvino bhiṣajo 'dhyātmavidaḥ parīkṣakāḥ // Saund_8.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:762: nikhilena ca satyam ucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyaste /
GK19asvsaunu:763: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni madākulāni ca // Saund_8.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:764: iti tena sa coditas tadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:765: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ pravivakṣur ātmanaḥ // Saund_8.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:766: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:767: mṛdubhir mṛdumāruteritair upagūdhāv iva bālapallavaiḥ // Saund_8.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:768: sa jagāda tataś cikīṣitam ghananiśvāsagṛhītam antarā /
GK19asvsaunu:769: śrutavāgviśadāya bhikṣave viduṣā pravrajitena durvacam // Saund_8.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:770: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:771: adhṛtau yad iyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ // Saund_8.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:772: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi /
GK19asvsaunu:773: na hi bhāvam imaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate 'py asādhave // Saund_8.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:774: tad idaṃ śṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharavidhāv ṛte priyām /
GK19asvsaunu:775: girisānuṣu kāminīm ṛte kṛtaretā iva kiṃnaraś caran // Saund_8.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:776: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛham eva yena me /
GK19asvsaunu:777: na hi śarma labhe tayā vinā nṛpatir hīna ivottamaśriyā // Saund_8.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:778: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:779: śramaṇaḥ sa śiraḥ prakampayan nijagādātmagataṃ śanair idam // Saund_8.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:780: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:781: pravivikṣati vāgurāṃ mṛgaś capalo gītaraveṇa vañcitaḥ // Saund_8.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:782: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:783: vicaran phalapuṣpavadvanaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svayam eva pañjaram // Saund_8.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:784: kalabhaḥ kariṇā khalūddhṛto bahupaṅkād viṣamān nadītalāt /
GK19asvsaunu:785: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatī titīrṣati // Saund_8.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:786: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareña bodhitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:787: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayam ugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati // Saund_8.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:788: mahatā khalu jātavedasā jvalitād utpatito vanadrumāt /
GK19asvsaunu:789: punar icchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ // Saund_8.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:790: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:791: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ // Saund_8.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:792: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:793: aśanaṃ khalu vāntam ātmanā kṛpañaḥ śvā punar attum icchati // Saund_8.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:794: iti manmathaśokakarṣitaṃ tam anudhyāya muhur nirīkṣya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:795: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavadvākyam uvāca vipriyam // Saund_8.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:797: upapannam alabdhacakusuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavet tava // Saund_8.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:799: aviṣaktamateś calātmano na hi dharme 'bhiratir vidhīyate // Saund_8.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:800: viṣayeṣu tu doṣadarśinaḥ parituṣṭasya śucer amāninaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:801: śamakarmasu yuktacetasaḥ kṛtabuddher na ratir na vidyate // Saund_8.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:802: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhen bāliśaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:803: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā // Saund_8.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:805: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatir vāyuvaśād girer iva // Saund_8.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:807: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayed doṣavate gṛhāya saḥ // Saund_8.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:808: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parmuktaḥ punar eva bandhanam /
GK19asvsaunu:809: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punar gṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam // Saund_8.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:810: puruṣaś ca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punar icchet kalim eva sevitum /
GK19asvsaunu:811: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliṣaḥ kalibhūtām ajitendriyaḥ priyām // Saund_8.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:812: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:813: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:814: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vītamadā bhayapradāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:815: iti doṣabhayāvahāś ca tāḥ katham arhanti niṣevanaṃ nu tāḥ // Saund_8.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:816: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhṛdaś cāpi suhṛjjanena yat /
GK19asvsaunu:817: paradoṣavikṣaṇāḥ śaṭhās tadanāryāḥ pracaranti yoṣitaḥ // Saund_8.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:818: kulajāḥ kṛpaṇībhavanti yad yad ayuktaṃ pracaranti sāhasam /
GK19asvsaunu:819: praviśanti ca yac camūmukhaṃ rabhasās tatra nimittam aṅganāḥ // Saund_8.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:820: vacanena haranati valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā /
GK19asvsaunu:821: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣam // Saund_8.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:822: pradahan dahano 'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano 'pi gṛhyate /
GK19asvsaunu:823: kupito bhujago 'pi gṛhyate pradānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate // Saund_8.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:824: na vapur vimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam /
GK19asvsaunu:825: praharanty aviśeṣataḥ striyaḥ sarito grāhakulākulā iva // Saund_8.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:826: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca suahṛdaṃ kva cit /
GK19asvsaunu:827: kalitā vanitaiva cañcalā tad ihāriṣv iva nāvalambyate // Saund_8.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:828: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam /
GK19asvsaunu:829: praṇateṣu bhavanti garvitāḥ pramadās tṛptatarāś ca māniṣu // Saund_8.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:830: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat /
GK19asvsaunu:831: dhanavatsu caranti tṛṣṇayā dhanahīneṣu caranty avajñayā // Saund_8.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:832: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaraty eva yathā hṛtāpi gauḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:834: praviśanty api hi striyaś citām anubhadhnanty api muktajīvtāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:835: api bibhrati naiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sāhṛdam // Saund_8.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:836: ramayanti patīn kathaṃ cana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kva cit /
GK19asvsaunu:837: calacittatayā sahasraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svan eva tāḥ // Saund_8.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:838: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī /
GK19asvsaunu:839: mṛgarājam atho bṛhadrathā pramadānām agatir na vidyate // Saund_8.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:841: munir ugratapāś ca gautamaḥ samavāpur vanitoddhataṃ rajaḥ // Saund_8.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:842: akṛtajñam anāryam asthiraṃ vanitānām ida īdṛśaṃ manaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:843: katham arhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu // Saund_8.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:844: atha sūkṣmamati dvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi /
GK19asvsaunu:845: kimu kāyam asadgṛhaṃ sravad vaintānām aśuciṃ na paśyasi // Saund_8.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:847: yad ahany ahani pradhāvanair vasanaiś cābharaṇaiś ca saṃskṛtam /
GK19asvsaunu:848: aśubhaṃ tamasāvṛtekṣaṇaḥ śubhato gacchasi nāvagacchasi // Saund_8.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:849: atha vā samavaiṣi tattanūm aśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvid asti te /
GK19asvsaunu:850: surabhiṃ vidadhāsi hi kriyām aśuces tatprabhavasya śāntaye // Saund_8.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:852: yadi sādhu kim atra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci // Saund_8.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:854: yadi sā tava sundarī bhaven niyataṃ te 'dya na sundarī bhavet // Saund_8.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:855: sravatīm aśuciṃ spṛśec ca kaḥ saghuṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam /
GK19asvsaunu:856: yadi kevalayā tvacāvṛtā na bhaven makṣikapattramātrayā // Saund_8.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:857: tvacaveṣṭhitam astipañjaraṃ yadi kāyaṃ samavaiṣi yoṣitām /
GK19asvsaunu:858: madanena ca kṛṣyase balād aghṛṇaḥ kāyaṃ samvaiṣi yoṣitām // Saund_8.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:860: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām // Saund_8.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:861: tad avetya manaḥśarīrayor vanitā doṣavatīr viśeṣataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:862: capalaṃ bhavanotsukaṃ manaḥ pratisaṃkhyānabalena vāryatām // Saund_8.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:863: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam /
GK19asvsaunu:864: upagamya yathā tathā punar na hi behttuṃ niyamaṃ tvam arhasi // Saund_8.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:866: nidhanam api varaṃ sthirātmanaś cyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam // Saund_8.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:867: baddhvā yathā hi kavacaṃ pragṛhītacāpo nindyo bhavaty apasṛtaḥ samarād rathasthaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:868: bhaikṣākam abhyupagataḥ parigṛhya liṅgaṃ nindyas tathā bhavati kāmarhṛtendriyāśvaḥ // Saund_8.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:869: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarasrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuś calacitramauliḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:870: vairūpyam abhyupagataḥ paraiṇḍabhojī hāsyas tathā gṛhasukhābhimukhaḥ satṛṣṇaḥ // Saund_8.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:871: yathā svannaṃ bhuktvā paramaśyanīye 'pi śayito varāho nirmuktaḥ punar aśuci dhāvet paricitam /
GK19asvsaunu:872: tathā śreyaḥ śṛṇvan praśamasukham āsvādya guṇavad vanaṃ śāntaṃ hitvā gṛham abhilaṣet kāmatṛṣitaḥ // Saund_8.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:873: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:874: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśur api gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bhuvidham anarthāya bhavati // Saund_8.61 //
GK19asvsaunu:875: tad vijñāya manaḥśarīraniyatān nāriṣu doṣān imān matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca /
GK19asvsaunu:876: dṛṣṭvā durbalam āmapatrasadṛśaṃ mṛtyūpasṛṣṭaṃ jagan nirmokṣāya kuruṣva buddhim atulām utkaṇṭhituṃ nārhasi // Saund_8.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:879: athaivam ukto 'pi sa tena bhiṣuṇā jagāma naivopaśamaṃ priyāṃ prati /
GK19asvsaunu:880: tathā hi tām eva tadā sa cintayan na tasya śuśrāva visaṃjñavad vacaḥ // Saund_9.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:881: yathā hi vaidyasya cikīrṣataḥ śivaṃ vaco na gṛhnāti mumūrṣur āturaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:882: tathaiva matto balarūpayauvanair hitaṃ na jagrādha sa tasya tadvacaḥ // Saund_9.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:883: na cātra citraṃ yadi rāgapāpmanā mano 'bhibhūyeta tamovṛtāmanaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:884: narasya pāpmā hi tadā nivartate yadā bhavaty antagataṃ tamas tanu // Saund_9.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:885: tatas tathākṣiptam avekṣya taṃ tadā balena rūpeṇa ca yauvanena ca /
GK19asvsaunu:886: gṛhaprayāṇaṃ prati ca vyavasthitaṃ śaśāsa nandaṃ śramaṇaḥ sa śantaye // Saund_9.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:887: balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca navaṃ ca yauvanaṃ tathāvagacchāmi yathāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsaunu:888: ahaṃ iv idaṃ te trayam avyavastitaṃ yathāvabuddho na tathāvabudhyase // Saund_9.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:889: idaṃ hi rogāyatanaṃ jarāvaśaṃ nadītaṭānokahavac calācalam /
GK19asvsaunu:890: na vetsi dehaṃ jalaphenadurbalaṃ balasthatām ātmani yena manyase // Saund_9.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:892: śarīram āsannavipatti dṛśyate bale 'bhimānas tava kena hetunā // Saund_9.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:894: jalaṃ śucau māsa ivārkaraśmibhiḥ kṣayaṃ vrajan kiṃ baladṛpta manyase // Saund_9.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:896: ajasram ārtaṃ satatapratikriyaṃ balānvito 'smīti kathaṃ vihanyase // Saund_9.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:897: yathā ghaṭaṃ mṛnmayam āmam āśrito naras titīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam /
GK19asvsaunu:898: samucchrayaṃ tadvad asāram udvahan balaṃ vyavasyed viṣayārtham udyataḥ // Saund_9.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:899: śariram āmād api mṛnmayam āmam āśrito naras titīrṣet kṣubhitaṃ mahārṇavam /
GK19asvsaunu:900: citraṃ hi tiṣṭhed vidhivaddhṛto ghaṭād idaṃ nu niḥsāratmaṃ mataṃ mama // Saund_9.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:901: yadāmbubhūvāyvanalāś ca dhātavaḥ sadā viruddhā viṣamā ivoragāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:902: bhavanty anarthāya śarīram āśritāḥ kathaṃ balaṃ rogavidho vyavasyasi // Saund_9.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:903: prāyanti mantraiḥ praśamaṃ bhujaṅgamā na mantrasādhyās tu bhavanti dhātavaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:904: kva cic ca kiṃ cic ca daśanti pannagāḥ sadā ca sarvaṃ ca tudanti dhātavaḥ // Saund_9.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:905: idaṃ hi śayyāsanapānabhojanair guṇaiḥ śariraṃ ciram apy avekṣitam /
GK19asvsaunu:906: na marṣayaty ekam api vytikramaṃ yato mahāśiviṣavat prakupyati // Saund_9.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:907: yadā himārto jvalanaṃ niṣevate himaṃ nidāghābhihato 'bhikāṅkṣati /
GK19asvsaunu:908: kṣudhānivto 'nnaṃ salilaṃ tṛṣānvito balaṃ kutaḥ kiṃ ca kathaṃ ca kasya ca // Saund_9.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:909: tad evam ajñāya śarīram āturaṃ balānvito 'smīti na mantum arhasi /
GK19asvsaunu:910: asāram asvantam aniścitaṃ jagaj jagaty anitye balam avyavasthitam // Saund_9.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:911: kva kārtavīryasya balābhimāninaḥ shasrabāhor balam arjunasya tat /
GK19asvsaunu:912: cakarta bāhūn yudhi yasya bhārgavo mahānti śṛṅgāṇy aśanir girer iva // Saund_9.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:913: kva tadbalaṃ kaṃsavikarṣiṇo hares turaṅgarājasya puṭāvabhedinaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:914: yam ekabāṇena nijaghinvān jarāḥ kramāgatā rūpam ivottamaṃ jarā // Saund_9.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:915: diteḥ sutasyāmararoṣakāriṇaś camūrucer vā namuceḥ kva tadbalam /
GK19asvsaunu:916: yam āhave kruddham ivāntakaṃ sthitaṃ jaghāna phenāvayavena vāsavaḥ // Saund_9.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:917: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ kva ca tat tadābhavad yudhi jvalitvā tarasaujasā ca ye /
GK19asvsaunu:918: samitsammidhā jvalanā ivādhvare hatāsavo bhasmani paryavasthitāḥ // Saund_9.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:919: ato viditvā balvīryamānināṃ balānvitānām avamarditaṃ balam /
GK19asvsaunu:920: jagaj jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ vicārayan bale 'bhimānaṃ na vidhātum arhasi // Saund_9.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:921: balaṃ mahad vā yadi vā na manyase kuruṣva yuddhaṃ saha tāvad indriyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:922: jayaś ca te 'trāsti mahac ca te balaṃ parājayaś ced vitathaṃ ca te balam // Saund_9.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:923: tathā matā vīratarā manīṣiṇo jayanti lohāni ṣaśindriyāṇi ye // Saund_9.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:924: ahaṃ vapuṣmān iti yac ca manyase vicakṣaṇaṃ naitad idaṃ ca gṛhyatām /
GK19asvsaunu:925: kva tad vapuḥ sā ca vapuṣmatī tanur gadasya sāmyasya ca sāraṇasya ca // Saund_9.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:926: yathā mayūraś calacitracandrako bibharti rūpaṃ guṇavat svabhāvataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:927: śarīrasaṃskāraguṇād ṛte tathā bibharṣi rūpaṃ yadi rūpavān asi // Saund_9.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:928: yadi pratīpaṃ vṛṇuyān na vāsasā na śaucakāle yadi saṃspṛśed apaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:929: mṛjāviśeṣaṃ yadi nādadīta vā vapur vapuṣman vada kīdṛśaṃ bhavet // Saund_9.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:930: navaṃ vayaś cātmagataṃ niśāmya yad gṛhonmukhaṃ te viṣayāptaye manaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:931: niyaccha tac chailanadīrayopamaṃ drutaṃ hi gacchaty anvirati yauvanam // Saund_9.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:932: ṛtur vyatītaḥ parivartate punaḥ kṣayaṅ prayātaḥ punar eti candramāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:933: gataṃ gataṃ naiva tu saṃnivartate jalaṃ nadīnāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ ca yauvanam // Saund_9.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:935: yadā mukhaṃ drakṣyasi jarjaraṃ tadā jarābhibhūto vimado bhaviṣyasi // Saund_9.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:936: niṣevya pānaṃ madanīyam uttamaṃ niśāvivāseṣu cirād vimādyati /
GK19asvsaunu:937: naras tu matto balarūpayauvanair na kaś cid aprāpya jarāṃ vimādyati // Saund_9.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:938: yathekṣur atyantarasaprapīḍito bhuvi praviddho dahanāya śuṣyate /
GK19asvsaunu:939: tathā jarāyantraniīḍitā tanur nipītasārā maraṇāya tiṣṭhati // Saund_9.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:940: yathā hi nṛbhyāṃ karapattram īritaṃ samucchritaṃ dāru bhinatty anekadhā /
GK19asvsaunu:941: tathocchritāṃ pātayati prajām imām aharniśābhyām upasaṃhitā jarā // Saund_9.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:942: smṛteḥ pramoṣo vapuṣaḥ parābhavo rateḥ kṣayo vācchruticakṣuṣāṃ grahaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:943: śramasya yonir balvīryayor vadho jarāsamo nāsti śarīriṇāṃ ripuḥ // Saund_9.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:944: idaṃ viditvā nidhanasya daiśikaṃ jarābhidahānaṃ jagato mahadbhayam /
GK19asvsaunu:945: ahaṃ vapuṣmān balavān yuveti vā na mānam āroḍhum anāryam arhasi // Saund_9.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:946: ahaṃ mamety eva ca raktacetasāṃ śarīrasaṃjñā tava yaḥ kalau grahaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:947: tam utsṛjaivaṃ yadi śāmyatā bhaved bhayaṃ hy ahaṃ ceti mameti cārchati // Saund_9.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:948: yadā śarīre na vaśo 'sti kasya cin nirasyamāne vividhair upaplavaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:949: kathaṃ kṣamaṃ vettum ahaṃ mameti vā śarīrasaṃjñaṃ gṛham āpadām idam // Saund_9.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:950: sapannage yaḥ kugṛhe sadāśucau rameta nityaṃ pratisaṃskṛte 'bale /
GK19asvsaunu:951: sa duṣṭadhātāv aśucau calācale rameta kāye viparītdarśanaḥ // Saund_9.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:952: yathā prarohanti tṛṇāny ayatnataḥ kṣitau prayatnāt tu bhavnti śālayaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:953: tathaiva duḥkhāni tṛñāny ayatnataḥ kṣitau pryatnāt tu bhavanti vā na vā // Saund_9.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:954: śarīram ārtaṃ parikarṣataś calaṃ na cāsti kiṃ cit paramārthataḥ sukham /
GK19asvsaunu:955: sukhaṃ hi duḥkhapratikārasevayā sthite ca duḥkhe tanuni vyasvasyati // Saund_9.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:956: yathānapekṣyāgryam apīsitaṃ sukhaṃ prabādhate duḥkham upetam aṇv api /
GK19asvsaunu:957: tathānapekṣyātmani duḥkham āgataṃ na vidyate kiṃ cana kasya cit sukham // Saund_9.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:958: śarīram īdṛgbhahuduḥkham adhruvaṃ phalānurodhāh atha nāvagacchasi /
GK19asvsaunu:959: dravat phalebhyo dhṛtiraśmibhir mano nigṛhyatāṃ gaur iva śasyalālasā // Saund_9.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:960: na kāmabhogā hi bhavanti tṛptaye havīṃṣi dīptasya vibhāvasor iva /
GK19asvsaunu:961: yathā yathā kāmasukheṣu vartate tathā tathecchā viṣayeṣu vardhate // Saund_9.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:962: yathā ca kuṣṭhavyasanena duḥkhitaḥ pratāpanān naiva śamaṃ nigacchati /
GK19asvsaunu:963: tathendriyārtheṣv ajitendriyaś caran na kāmabhogair upaśāntim ṛcchati // Saund_9.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:964: yathā hi bhaiṣajyasukhābhikāṅkṣayā bhajeta rogān na bhajeta tatkṣamam /
GK19asvsaunu:965: tathā śarīre bahuduḥkhabhājane rameta mohād viṣayābhikāṅkṣayā // Saund_9.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:966: anarthakāmaḥ puruṣasya yo janaḥ sa tasya śatruḥ kila tena karmaṇā /
GK19asvsaunu:967: anarthamūlā viṣayāś ca kevalā nanu praheyā viṣamā yathārayaḥ // Saund_9.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:968: ihaiva bhūtvā ripavo vadhātmakāḥ prayānti kāle puruṣasya mitratām /
GK19asvsaunu:969: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetavo bhavanti kāmā na tu kasya cic chivāḥ // Saund_9.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:970: yathopayuktaṃ rasavarṇagandhavad vadhāya kiṃpākaphalaṃ na puṣṭaye /
GK19asvsaunu:971: niṣevyamāṇā viṣayāś calātmano bhavanty anarthāya tathā na bhūtaye // Saund_9.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:972: tat etad ājñāya vipāpmanātmanā vimokṣadharmādyupasaṃhitaṃ hitam /
GK19asvsaunu:973: juṣasva me sajjanasaṃmataṃ mataṃ pracakṣva vā niścayam udgiran giram // Saund_9.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:974: iti hitam api bahv apīdam uktaḥ śrutamahatā śramaṇena tena nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:975: na dhṛtim upayayau na śarma lebhe dvirada ivātimado madāndhacetāḥ // Saund_9.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:976: nandasya bhāvam avagamya tataḥ sa bhikṣuḥ pāriplavaṃ gṛhasukhābhimukhaṃ na dharme /
GK19asvsaunu:977: sattvāśayānuśayabhāvaparkṣakāya buddhāya tattvadiuṣe kathayāṃ cakāra // Saund_9.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:978: Saundaranande mahākāvye madāpavādo nāma navamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:980: śrutvā tataḥ sadvratam utsisṛkṣuṃ bhāryāṃ didṛkṣuṃ bhavanaṃ vivikṣum /
GK19asvsaunu:981: nandaṃ nirānandam apetadhairyam abhyujjihīrṣur munir ājuhāva // Saund_10.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:982: taṃ prāptam aprāptavimokṣamārgaṃ papraccha cittaskhalitaṃ sucittaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:983: sa hrīmate hrīvinato jagāda svaṃ niścayaṃ niścayakovidāya // Saund_10.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:984: nandaṃ viditvā sugatas tatas taṃ bhāryābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam /
GK19asvsaunu:985: pāṇau gṛhītvā viyad utpapāta maṇiṃ jale sādhur ivojjihīrṣuḥ // Saund_10.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:986: kāṣāyavastrau kanakāvadātau virejatus tau nabhasi prasanne /
GK19asvsaunu:989: ājagmatuḥ kāñcanadhātumantaṃ devarṣimantaṃ himavantam āśu // Saund_10.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:990: tasmin girau cārañasiddhajuṣṭe śive havir dhūmakṛttottarīye /
GK19asvsaunu:991: āgamya pārasya nirāśrayasya tau tasthatur dvīpa ivāmbarasya // Saund_10.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:992: śāntendriye tatra munau sthite tu savismayaṃ dikṣu dadarśa nandaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:993: darīś ca kuñjāṃś ca vanaukasaś ca vibhūṣaṇaṃ rakṣaṇam eva cādreḥ // Saund_10.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:994: bahvāyate tatra site hi śṛṅge saṃkṣiptabarhaḥ śayito mayūraḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:999: babhau gireḥ prasravaṇaṃ pipāsur ditsan pitṛbhyo 'mbha ivāvatirṇaḥ // Saund_10.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:1000: calatkadambe himvannitambe tarau pralambe camaro lalambe /
GK19asvsaunu:1001: chettuṃ vilagnaṃ na śaśāka bālaṃ kulodgatāṃ prītim ivāryavṛttaḥ // Saund_10.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:1003: sārdūlapātapratimā guhābhayo niśeptur udgāra ivācalasya // Saund_10.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:1005: vṛdndāni rejur diśi kiṃnarīṇāṃ puṣpotkacānām iva vallarīṇām // Saund_10.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:1006: nagān nagasyopari devadārūn āyāsayantaḥ kapayo viceruḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1007: tebhyaḥ phalaṃ nāpurato 'pajagmur moghaprasādebhya iveśvarebhyaḥ // Saund_10.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:1009: śākhāmṛgīm ekavipannadṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā munir nandam idaṃ babhāṣe // Saund_10.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:1010: kā nanda rūpeṇa ca ceṣṭayā ca saṃpaśyataś cārutarā matā te /
GK19asvsaunu:1011: eṣā mṛgī viakavipanndṛṣṭiḥ sa vā jano yatra gatā taveṣṭiḥ // Saund_10.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:1012: ity evam uktaḥ sugatena nandaḥ kṛtvā smitaṃ kiṃ cid idaṃ jagāda /
GK19asvsaunu:1013: kva cottamastrī bhagavan badhūs te mṛgi nagakleśkarī kva caiṣā // Saund_10.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:1014: tato munis tasya niśamya vākyaṃ hetvantaraṃ kiṃ cid avekṣamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1015: ālambya nandaṃ prayayau tathaiva krīḍāvanaṃ vajradharasya rājñaḥ // Saund_10.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:1016: ṛtāv rtāv ākṛtim eka eke kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bibhrati yatra vṛkṣāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1017: citrāṃ samastām api ke cid anye ṣaṇṇām ṛtūnāṃ śriyam udvahanti // Saund_10.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:1018: puṣyanti ke cit surabhīr udārā mālāḥ srajaś ca grathitā vicitrāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1019: karṇānukūlān avataṃsakāṃṣ ca pratyarthibhūtān iva kuṇḍalānām // Saund_10.20 //
GK19asvsaunu:1020: raktāni phullāḥ kamalāni yatra pradīpavṛkṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣā /
GK19asvsaunu:1021: praphullanīlotpalarohiṇo 'nye sonmīlitākṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣā // Saund_10.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:1023: atāntavāny ekaghanāni yatra sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti vṛkṣā // Saund_10.22 /
GK19asvsaunu:1024: hārān maṇīn uttamakuṇḍalāni keyūravaryāṇy atha nūpurāṇi /
GK19asvsaunu:1025: evaṃvidhāny ābharaṇāni yatra svargānurūpāṇi phalanti vṛkṣaḥ // Saund_10.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:1027: sparśakṣamāṇy uttamagandhavanti rohanti niṣkampatalā nalinyaḥ // Saund_10.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:1028: yatrāyatāṃś caiva tatāṃś ca tāṃs tān vādyasya hetūn suṣirān ghanāṃś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1029: phalanti vṛkṣā maṇihemacitrāḥ krīḍāsahāyās tridaśālayānām // Saund_10.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:1030: mandāravṛkṣāṃś ca kuśeśayāṃś ca puṣpānatān kokanadāṃś ca vṛkṣān /
GK19asvsaunu:1031: ākramya māhātmyaguṇair virājan rājāyate yatra sa pārijātaḥ // Saund_10.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:1033: evaṃvidhā yatra saānuvṛttā divaukasāṃ bhogavidhānavṛkṣāḥ // Saund_10.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:1034: manaḥśilābhair vadanair vihaṅgā yatrākṣibhiḥ spāṭikasaṃnibhaiś ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1035: śāvaiś ca pakṣair abhilohitāntair māñjiṣṭhakair ardhasitaiś ca pādaiḥ // Saund_10.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:1036: citraiḥ suvarṇacchadanais tathānye vaiḍuryavarṇābhir nayanaiḥ prasannaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1037: vihaṅgamā śiñjirikābhidhānā rutair manaḥśrotaharair bhramanti // Saund_10.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:1038: raktābhir agreṣu ca vallarībhir madhyeṣu cāmīkarapiñjarābhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1039: vaiḍūryavarṇābhir upāntamadhyeṣv alaṅkṛtā yatra khagāś caranti // Saund_10.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:1040: rociṣṇavo nāma patratriṇo 'nye dīptāgnivarṇā jvalitair ivāsyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1041: bhramanti dṛṣṭīr vapuṣākṣipantaḥ svanaiḥ śubhair apsaraso harantaḥ // Saund_10.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:1043: svaiḥ karmabhir hīnaviśiṣṭtamadhyāḥ svayaṃprabhāḥ puṇyakṛto ramante // Saund_10.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:1045: manāṃsi khinnāni tapodhanānāṃ haranti yatrāpsaraso laḍantyāḥ // Saund_10.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:1046: nityotsavaṃ taṃ ca niśāmya lokaṃ nistandrinidrāratiśokarogam /
GK19asvsaunu:1047: nando jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ sadārtaṃ mene śmaśānapratimaṃ nṛlokam // Saund_10.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:1048: aindraṃ vanaṃ tac ca dadarśa nandaḥ samantato vismayaphulladṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1049: harṣānvitāś cāpsarasaḥ parīyuḥ sagarvam anyonyam avekṣamāṇāḥ // Saund_10.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:1050: sadā yuvatyo madanaikakāryāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ vihārāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1051: divyāś ca nirdoṣaparigrahāś ca tapaḥphalasyāśrayaṇaṃ surāṇām // Saund_10.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:1052: tāsāṃ jagur dhīram udāttam anyāḥ padmāni kāś cil lalitaṃ labhañjuḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1053: anyonyaharṣān nanṛtus tathānyāś cirāṅgahārāḥ stanabhinnabhārāḥ // Saund_10.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:1054: kāsāṃ cid āsāṃ vadanāni rejur vanāntarebhyaś calakuṇḍalāni /
GK19asvsaunu:1056: tāḥ niḥsṛtāḥ prekṣya vanāntarebhyas taḍitpatākā iva toyadebhyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1057: nandasya rāgeṇa tanur vivepe jale cale candramasaḥ prabheva // Saund_10.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:1058: vapuś ca divyaṃ lalitāś ca ceṣṭās tataḥ sa tāsāṃ manasā jahāra /
GK19asvsaunu:1059: kautūhalāvarjitayā ca dṛṣṭyā saṃśleṣatarṣād iva jātarāgaḥ // Saund_10.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:1061: lolendriyāśvena manorathena jehriyamāṇo na dhṛtiṃ cakāra // Saund_10.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:1062: yathā manuṣyo malinaṃ hi vāsaḥ kṣāreṇa bhūyo malinīkaroti /
GK19asvsaunu:1063: malakṣayārthaṃ na malodbhavārtaṃ rajas tathāsmai munir ācakarṣa // Saund_10.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:1064: doṣāṃś ca kāyād bhiṣaguj jihīrṣur bhūyo yathā kleśayituṃ yateta /
GK19asvsaunu:1065: rāgaṃ tathā tasya munir jighāṃsur bhūyastaraṃ rāgam upānināya // Saund_10.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:1066: dīpaprabhāṃ hanti yathāndhakāre sahasraraśmer uditasya dīptiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1067: manuṣyaloke dyutim aṅganānām antardadhāty apsarasāṃ tathā śrīḥ // Saund_10.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:1068: mahac ca rūpaṃ svaṇu hanti rūpaṃ śabdo mahān hanti ca śabdam alpam /
GK19asvsaunu:1069: gurvī rujā hanti rujāṃ ca mṛdviṃ sarvo mahān hetur aṇor vadhāya // Saund_10.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:1070: muneḥ prabhāvāc ca śaśāka nandas taddarśanaṃ soḍhum asahyam anyaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1071: avitarāgasya hi durbalasya mano dahed apsarasāṃ vapuḥṣrīḥ // Saund_10.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:1072: matvā tato nandam udīrṇarāgaṃ bhāryānurodhād apavṛttarāgam /
GK19asvsaunu:1073: rāgeṇa rāgaṃ pratihantukāmo munir virāgo giram ity uvāca // Saund_10.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:1074: etāḥ strīyaḥ paśya divaukasas tvaṃ nirīkṣya ca brūhi yathārthattvam /
GK19asvsaunu:1075: etāḥ kathaṃ rūpaguṇair matās te sa vā jano yatra gataṃ manas te // Saund_10.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:1077: sagadgagadaṃ kāmaviṣaktacetāḥ kṛtāñjalir vākyam uvāca nandaḥ // Saund_10.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:1078: haryaṅganāsau muṣitaikadṛṣṭir yadantare syāt tava nātha vadhvāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1079: tadantare 'sau kṛpaṇā vadhūs te vauṣmatīr apsarasaḥ pratītya // Saund_10.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:1080: āsthā yathā pūrvam abhūn na kā cid anyāsu me striṣu niśāmya bhāryām /
GK19asvsaunu:1081: tasyāṃ tataḥ samprati kā cid āsthā na me niśāmyaiva hi rūpam āsām // Saund_10.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:1082: yathā pratapto mṛdunātapena dahyeta kaś cin mahatānalena /
GK19asvsaunu:1083: rāgeṇa pūrvaṃ mṛdunābhitapto rāgāninānena tathābhidahye // Saund_10.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:1084: vāgvāriṇā māṃ pariṣiñca tasmād yāvan na dahye sa ivāhjaśatruḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1085: rārāgnir adyaiva hi māṃ didhakṣuḥ kakṣaṃ savṛkṣāgram ivotthito 'gniḥ // Saund_10.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:1086: prasīda sīdāmi vimuñca mā mune vasundharādhairya na dhairyam asti me /
GK19asvsaunu:1087: asūn vimokṣyāmi vimuktamānasa prayccha vā vāgamṛtaṃ mumūrṣave // Saund_10.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:1089: ahaṃ hi daṣṭo hṛdi manmathāhinā vidhatsya tasmād agadaṃ mahābhiṣak // Saund_10.55 //
