GK19asvsaunu:1090: anena daṣṭo madanāhinā hi nā na kaś cid ātmany anavasthitaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1091: mumoha vodhyor hy acalātmano mano babhūva dhīmāṃś ca sa śantanus tanuḥ // Saund_10.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:1092: sthite viśiṣṭe tvayi saṃśraye śraye yathā na yāmīha vasan diśaṃ diśam /
GK19asvsaunu:1093: yathā ca labdhvā vyasanakṣayaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajāmi tan me kuru śaṃsataḥ sataḥ // Saund_10.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:1094: tato jighāṃsur hṛdi tasya tattamas tamonudo naktam ivotthitaṃ tamaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1095: maharṣicandro jagatas tamonudas tamaḥprahīṇo nijagāda gautamaḥ // Saund_10.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:1096: dhṛtiṃ pariṣvajya vidhūya vikriyāṃ nigṛhya tāvac chrutacetasī śṛṇu /
GK19asvsaunu:1097: imā yadi prārthayase tvam aṅganā vidhatsva śulkārtham ihottamaṃ tapaḥ // Saund_10.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:1098: imā hi śakyā na balān na sevayā na saṃpradānena na rūptavattayā /
GK19asvsaunu:1099: imā hriyante khalu dharmacaryayā sacet praharṣaś cara dharmam ādṛtaḥ // Saund_10.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:1100: ihādhivāso divi daivataiḥ samaṃ vanāni ramyāṇy ajarāś ca yoṣitaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1101: idaṃ phalaṃ svasya śubhasya karmaṇo na dattam anyena na cāpy ahetutaḥ // Saund_10.61 //
GK19asvsaunu:1102: kṣitau manuṣyo dhanurādhibhiḥ śramaiḥ striyaḥ kadā cid dhi labheta vā na vā /
GK19asvsaunu:1103: asaṃśayaṃ yat tv iha dharmacaryayā bhaveyur etā divi puṇakarmaṇaḥ // Saund_10.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:1104: tad apramatto niyame samudyato ramasva yady apsaraso 'bhilipsase /
GK19asvsaunu:1105: ahaṃ ca te 'tra pratibhūḥ sthire vrate yathā tvam ābhir niyataṃ sameṣyasi // Saund_10.63 //
GK19asvsaunu:1106: ataḥparaṃ paramam iti vyavasthitaḥ parāṃ dhṛtim paramamunau cakāra saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1107: tato muniḥ pavana ivāmbarāt patan pragṛhya taṃ punar agaman mahītalam // Saund_10.64 //
GK19asvsaunu:1108: Saundaranande mahākāvye svarganidarśano nāma daśamaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1110: tatas tā yoṣito dṛṣṭvā nando nandanacāriṇīḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1111: babandha niyamastambhe durdamaṃ capalaṃ manaḥ // Saund_11.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:1113: cacāra viraso dharmaṃ niveśyāpsaraso hṛdi // Saund_11.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:1118: saṃvṛtena ca śāntena tīvreṇa madanena ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1119: jalāgner iva saṃsargāc chaśāma ca śuśoṣa ca // Saund_11.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:1122: prastaveṣv api bhāryāyāṃ priyabhāryas tathāpi saḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1123: vītarāga ivottasthau na jaharṣa na cukṣubhe // Saund_11.7 //
GK19asvsaunu:1125: abhigamyābhravīn nandam ānandaḥ praṇayād idam // Saund_11.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:1127: nigṛhītendriyaḥ svastho niyame yadi saṃsthitaḥ // Saund_11.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:1129: yad iyaṃ saṃvid utpannā neyam alpena hetunā // Saund_11.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:1131: prabalaḥ prabalair eva yatnair naśyatti vā na vā // Saund_11.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:1132: durharo mānaso vyādhir balavāṃś ca tavābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:1133: vinivṛtto yadi sa te sarvathā dhṛtimānasi // Saund_11.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:1134: duṣkaraṃ sādhv anāryeṇa māninā caiva mārdavam /
GK19asvsaunu:1135: atisargaś ca lubdhena bramacaryaṃ ca rāgiṇā // Saund_11.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:1136: ekas tu mama saṃdehas tavāsyāṃ niyame dhṛtau /
GK19asvsaunu:1137: atrānunayam icchāmi vaktavyaṃ yadi manase // Saund_11.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:1138: ārjavābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ na ca gantavyam anyathā /
GK19asvsaunu:1139: rūkṣam apy āśaye śuddhe rūkṣato naiti sajjanaḥ // Saund_11.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:1140: spriyaṃ hi hitaṃ snigdham asnigdham ahitaṃ priyaṃ /
GK19asvsaunu:1141: durlabhaṃ tu priyahitaṃ svādu pathyam ivauṣadham // Saund_11.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:1143: marṣaṇaṃ praṇayaś caiva mitravṛttir iyaṃ satām // Saund_11.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:1144: tad idaṃ tvā vivakṣāmi praṇayān na jīghāṃsayā /
GK19asvsaunu:1145: tvacchreyo hi vivakṣā me yato nārhāmy upekṣitum // Saund_11.18 //
GK19asvsaunu:1147: kim idaṃ bhūtam āhosvit prarihāso 'yam īdṛśaḥ // Saund_11.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:1148: yadi tāvad idaṃ satyaṃ vakṣyāmy atra yudaṣadham /
GK19asvsaunu:1151: ślakṣṇapūrvam atho tena hṛdi so 'bhihatas tadā /
GK19asvsaunu:1152: dhyātvā dīrghaṃ niśaśvāsa kiṃ cic cāvāñmukho 'bhavat // Saund_11.21 //
GK19asvsaunu:1154: babhāṣe vākyam ānando madhurodarkam apriyam // Saund_11.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:1156: yaj jñātvā tvayi jātaṃ me hāsyaṃ kāuṇyam eva ca // Saund_11.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:1157: yathāsanārthaṃ skandhena kaś cid gurvīṃ śilāṃ vahet /
GK19asvsaunu:1158: tadvat tvam api kāmārthaṃ niyamaṃ voḍhum udyataḥ // Saund_11.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:1160: tadvad abrahmacaryāya brahmacaryam idaṃ tava // Saund_11.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:1162: dharmacaryā tava tathā paṇyabhūtā na śāntaye // Saund_11.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:1164: tadvad viṣayakārpaṇyād viṣayāṃs tyaktavān asi // Saund_11.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:1166: duḥkham anvicchati bhavāṃs tathā viṣayatṛśṇayā // Saund_11.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:1167: yathā paśyati madhv eva na prapātam avekṣate /
GK19asvsaunu:1168: paśyasy apsarasas tadvad bhraṃśam ante na paśyasi // Saund_11.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:1169: hṛdi kāmāgninā dīpte kāyena vahato vratam /
GK19asvsaunu:1170: kim idaṃ brahmacaryaṃ te manasābrahmacāriṇaḥ // Saund_11.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:1172: prāptās tyaktāś ca śataśas tābhyaḥ kim iti te spṛhā // Saund_11.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:1174: nāpi kāmaiḥ satṛṣṇasya tasmāt kāmā na tṛptaye // Saund_11.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:1175: atṛptau ca kutaḥ śāntir aśāntau ca kutaḥ sukham /
GK19asvsaunu:1176: asukhe ca kutaḥ pṛtir aprītau ca kuto ratiḥ // Saund_11.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:1177: riraṃsā yadi te tasmād adhyātme dhīyatāṃ manaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1178: praśānta cānavadyā ca nāsty adhyātmasamā ratiḥ // Saund_11.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:1179: na tatra kāryaṃ tūryais te na strībhir na vibhūṣanaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1180: ekas tvaṃ yatratrasthas tayā ratyābhiraṃsyase // Saund_11.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:1181: mānasaṃ balavad duḥkhaṃ tarṣe tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhati /
GK19asvsaunu:1182: taṃ tarṣaṃ chindhi duḥkhaṃ hi tṛṣṇā cāsti ca nāsti ca // Saund_11.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:1183: saṃpattau vā vipattau vā divā vā naktam eva vā /
GK19asvsaunu:1184: kāmeṣu hi saṭṛṣñasya na śāntir upadadyate // Saund_11.37 //
GK19asvsaunu:1185: kāmānāṃ prārthanā duḥkhā prāptau tṛptir na vidyate /
GK19asvsaunu:1186: viyogān niyataḥ śoko viyogaś ca dhruvo divi // Saund_11.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:1187: kṛtvāpi duṣkaraṃ karma svargaṃ labdhvāpi durlabham /
GK19asvsaunu:1188: nṛlokaṃ punar evaiti pravāsāt svagṛhaṃ yathā // Saund_11.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:1189: yadā bhraṣṭasya kuśalaṃ śiṣṭaṃ kiṃ cin na vidyate /
GK19asvsaunu:1190: triyakṣu pitṛloke vā narake vopapadyate // Saund_11.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:1191: tasya bhuktavataḥ svarge viṣayān uttamān api /
GK19asvsaunu:1192: bhraṣṭasyārtasya duḥkhena kim āsvādaḥ karoti saḥ // Saund_11.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:1194: śibhiḥ svargāt paribhraṣṭas tādṛk kṛtvāpi duṣkaram // Saund_11.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:1196: sadevataṃ gate kāle māndhātādhaḥ punar yayau // Saund_11.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:1197: rājyaṃ kṛtvāpi devānāṃ papāta nahuṣo bhuvi /
GK19asvsaunu:1198: prāptaḥ kila bjuaṅgatvaṃ nādyāpi parimucyate // Saund_11.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:1200: svargaṃ gatvā punar bhraṣṭaḥ kūrmībhūtaḥ kilārṇave // Saund_11.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:1201: bhūrdiyumno yayātiś ca te cānye ca nṛparṣabhāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1202: karmabhir dyām abhikrīya tatkṣayāt punar atyajan // Saund_11.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:1204: śriyaṃ samanuśocantaḥ pātālaṃ śarañaṃ yayuḥ // Saund_11.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:1205: kiṃ ca rājarṣibhis tāvad asurair vā surādibhiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1206: mahendrāḥ śataśaḥ petur māhātmyam api na sthiram // Saund_11.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:1208: kṣīṇakarmā papātovriṃ madhyād apsarasāṃ rasan // Saund_11.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:1209: hā caitraratha hā vāpi hā mandākini hā priye /
GK19asvsaunu:1210: ity ārtā vilapanto 'pi gāṃ patanti divaukasaḥ // Saund_11.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:1211: tīvraṃ hy uptadyate duḥkham iha tāvan mumūrṣatām /
GK19asvsaunu:1212: kiṃ punaḥ patatāṃ svargād evānte sukhasevinām // Saund_11.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:1213: rajo gṛhṇanti vāsāṃsi mlāyanti paramāḥ srajaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1214: gātrebhyo jāyate svedo ratir bhavati nāsane // Saund_11.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:1215: etāny ādau nimittāni cyutau svargād divaukasām /
GK19asvsaunu:1217: sukham utpadyate yac ca divi kāmān upāśnatām /
GK19asvsaunu:1218: yac ca duḥkhaṃ nipatatāṃ duḥkham eva viṣiṣyate // Saund_11.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:1220: vijñāya kṣayiṇaṃ svargam apavarge matiṃ kuru // Saund_11.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:1221: aśarīraṃ bhavāgraṃ hi gatvāpi munir udrakaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1222: karmaṇo 'nte cyutas tasmāt tiryagyoniṃ prapatsyate // Saund_11.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:1224: sunetraḥ punar āvṛtto garbhavāsam upeyivān // Saund_11.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:1226: ko nāma svargavāsāya kṣeṣṇave spṛhayed budhaḥ // Saund_11.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:1227: sūtreṇa baddho hi yathā vihaṅgo vyāvartate dūragato 'pi bhūyaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1228: ajñānasūtreṇa tathāvabaddho gato 'pi dūraṃ punar eti lokaḥ // Saund_11.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:1229: kṛtvā kālavilakṣañaṃ pratibhuvā mukto yathā bandhanād bhuktvā veśmasukhāny atītya samayaṃ bhūyo viśed bandhanam /
GK19asvsaunu:1230: tadvad dyāṃ pratibhūvad ātmaniyamair dhyānādibhiḥ prāptavān kāle karmasu teṣu bhuktaviṣayeṣv ākṛṣyate gāṃ punaḥ // Saund_11.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:1231: antarjālagatāḥ pramattamanaso minās taḍāge yathā jānantī vyasanaṃ na rodhajanitaṃ svasthāś caranty ambhasi /
GK19asvsaunu:1232: antarlokagatāḥ kṛtārthamatayas tadvad divi dhyāyino manyante śivam acyutaṃ dhruvam iti svaṃ sthānam āvartakam // Saund_11.61 //
GK19asvsaunu:1233: tajjanmavyādhimṛtyuvyasanaparigataṃ matvā jagad idaṃ saṃsāre bhrāmyamāṇaṃ divi nṛṣu narake tiryakpitṛṣu ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1234: yat trāṇaṃ nirbhayaṃ yac chivam amarajaraṃ niḥṣokam amṛtaṃ taddhetor brahmacaryaṃ cara jahihi calaṃ svargaṃ prati rucim // Saund_11.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:1238: ānandena tadā nandaḥ paraṃ vrīḍam upāgamat // Saund_12.1 //
GK19asvsaunu:1239: tasya vriḍena mahatā pramodo hṛdi nābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:1240: aprāmodyena vimukhaṃ nāvatasthe vrate manaḥ // Saund_12.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:1242: paripākagate hetau na sa tan mamṛṣe vacaḥ // Saund_12.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:1243: aparīkṣabkabhāvāc ca pūrvaṃ matvā divaṃ dhruvam /
GK19asvsaunu:1244: tasmāt kṣeṣṇuṃ pariśrutya bhṛśaṃ saṃvegam eyivān // Saund_12.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:1247: svargatarṣān nivṛttaś ca sadyaḥ svastha ivābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:1248: mṛṣṭād apathyād virato jijīvṣur ivāturaḥ // Saund_12.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:1251: mahatām api bhūtānām āvṛtti iti cintayan /
GK19asvsaunu:1252: saṃvegāc ca sarāgo 'pi vītarāga ivābhavat // Saund_12.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:1253: babhūva sa hi saṃvegaḥ śreyasas tasya vṛddhaye /
GK19asvsaunu:1255: na tu kāmānmanas tasya kena cij jagṛhe dhṛtiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1256: triṣu kāleṣu sarveṣu nipāto 'stir iva smṛtaḥ // Saund_12.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:1258: so 'bhyagacchad guruṃ kale vivakṣur bhāvam ātmanaḥ // Saund_12.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:1260: kṛtvānjalim uvācedaṃ hriyā kiṃ cid avāñmukhaḥ // Saund_12.12 //
GK19asvsaunu:1261: apsaraḥprāptaye yan me bhagavan pratibhūr asi /
GK19asvsaunu:1262: nāpsarobhir mamārtho 'sti pratibhūtvaṃ tyajāmy aham // Saund_12.13 //
GK19asvsaunu:1263: śrutvā hy āvartakaṃ svargaṃ saṃsārasya ca citratām /
GK19asvsaunu:1264: na martyeṣu na deveṣu pravṛttir mama rocate // Saund_12.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:1265: yadi prāpya divaṃ yatnān niyamena damena ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1266: avitṛptāḥ patanaty ante svargāya tyāgine namaḥ // Saund_12.15 //
GK19asvsaunu:1267: ataś ca nikhilaṃ lokaṃ vidibā sacarācaram /
GK19asvsaunu:1269: tasmād vyāsamāsābhyāṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi /
GK19asvsaunu:1270: yac chrutvā śṛṇvatāṃ śreṣṭha paramaṃ prāpnuyāṃ padam // Saund_12.17 //
GK19asvsaunu:1274: araṇyāṃ mathyamānāyām agner dhūma ivotthitaḥ // Saund_12.19 //
GK19asvsaunu:1277: adya te saphalaṃ janma lābho 'dya sumahāṃs tava /
GK19asvsaunu:1280: vyathante hy apunarbhāvāt prapātād iva bāliśāḥ // Saund_12.22 //
GK19asvsaunu:1281: duḥkhaṃ na syāt sukhaṃ me syād iti prayatate janaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1282: atyantaduḥkhoparamaṃ sukhaṃ tac ca na budhyate // Saund_12.23 //
GK19asvsaunu:1284: kāmādiṣu jagat saktaṃ na vetti sukham avyayam // Saund_12.24 //
GK19asvsaunu:1285: sarvaduḥkhāpahaṃ tat tu hastatham amṛtaṃ tava /
GK19asvsaunu:1286: viṣaṃ pītvā yad agadaṃ samaye pātum icchasi // Saund_12.25 //
GK19asvsaunu:1288: rāgāgnis tādṛṣo yasya dharmonmukha parāṇmukhaḥ // Saund_12.26 //
GK19asvsaunu:1290: sadoṣam salilaṃ dṛṣṭvā pathineva pipāsunā // Saund_12.27 //
GK19asvsaunu:1291: īdṛśī nāma buddhis te niruddhā rajasābhavat /
GK19asvsaunu:1292: rajasā caṇḍavātena vivasvata iva prabhā // Saund_12.28 //
GK19asvsaunu:1293: sā jighāṃsus tamo hārdaṃ yā saṃprati vijṛmbhate /
GK19asvsaunu:1294: tamo naiśaṃ prabhā saurī vinirgīrṇeva meruṇā // Saund_12.29 //
GK19asvsaunu:1296: yat te syān naiṣṭhike sūkṣme śreyasi śraqddadhānatā // Saund_12.30 //
GK19asvsaunu:1298: sarvadharmā hi dharmajña niyamācx chandahetavaḥ // Saund_12.31 //
GK19asvsaunu:1300: śayyābuddhau ca śayanaṃ sthānabuddhau tathā sthitiḥ // Saund_12.32 //
GK19asvsaunu:1301: antarbhūmigataṃ hy ambhaḥ śraddadhāti naro yadā /
GK19asvsaunu:1302: arthitve sati yatnena tadā khanati gām imām // Saund_12.33 //
GK19asvsaunu:1303: nārthi yady agninā vā syāc chraddadhyāt taṃ na vāraṇau /
GK19asvsaunu:1304: mathnīyān nāraṇiṃ kaś cit tadbhāve sati mathyate // Saund_12.34 //
GK19asvsaunu:1305: sasyotpattiṃ yadi na vā śraddadhyāt kārṣakaḥ kṣitau /
GK19asvsaunu:1306: arthī sasyena vā na syād bhījāni na vaped bhuvi // Saund_12.35 //
GK19asvsaunu:1307: ataś ca hasta ity uktā mayā śraddhā viśeṣataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1308: yasmād gṛhnāti saddharmaṃ dāyaṃ hasta ivākṣataḥ // Saund_12.36 //
GK19asvsaunu:1309: prādhānyād indriyam iti shtiratvād balam ity ataḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1312: loke 'smin durlabhatvāc ca ratnam ity abhihāṣitā // Saund_12.38 //
GK19asvsaunu:1313: punaś ca bījam ity uktā nimittaṃ śreyasotpadā /
GK19asvsaunu:1314: pāvanārthena pāpasya nadīty abhihitā punaḥ // Saund_12.39 //
GK19asvsaunu:1315: yasmād dharmasya cottpattau śraddhā kāraṇam uttamam /
GK19asvsaunu:1316: mayoktā kāryatas tasmāt tatra tatra tathā tathā // Saund_12.40 //
GK19asvsaunu:1318: tad vṛddhau vardhate dharmo mūlavṛddhau yathā drumaḥ // Saund_12.41 //
GK19asvsaunu:1319: vyākulaṃ darśanaṃ yasya durbalo yasya niścayaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1320: tasya pāriplavā śraddhā na hi kṛtāya vartate // Saund_12.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:1321: yāvat tattvaṃ na bhavati hi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā tāvac chraddhā na bhavati balasthā sthirā vā /
GK19asvsaunu:1322: dṛṣṭe tattve niyamaparibhūtendriyasya śraddhāvṛkṣo bhavati saphalaś cāśrayās ca // Saund_12.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:1323: Saundaranande mahākāvye paryavamarśo nāma dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:1325: atha saṃrādhito nandaḥ śraddhāṃ prati maharṣinā /
GK19asvsaunu:1327: kṛtārtham iva taṃ mene saṃbuddhaḥ śraddhayā tayā /
GK19asvsaunu:1328: mene prāptam iva śreyaḥ sa ca buddhena saṃskṛtaḥ // Saund_13.2 //
GK19asvsaunu:1329: ślakṣṇena vacasā kāṃś cit kāṃś cit paruṣayā girā /
GK19asvsaunu:1330: kāṃś cid ābhyām upāyābhyāṃ sa vininye vināyakaḥ // Saund_13.3 //
GK19asvsaunu:1331: pāṃsubhyaḥ kāñcanaṃ jātaṃ viśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ śuci /
GK19asvsaunu:1332: sthitaṃ pāṃsuṣv api yathā pāṃsudoṣair na lipyate // Saund_13.4 //
GK19asvsaunu:1333: padmaparṇaṃ yathā caiva jale jātaṃ jale sthitham /
GK19asvsaunu:1334: upariṣṭād adhastād vā na jalendopalipyate // Saund_13.5 //
GK19asvsaunu:1335: tadval loke munir jāto lokasyānugrahaṃ caran /
GK19asvsaunu:1336: kṛtitvān nirmalatvāc ca lokadharmair na liyate // Saund_13.6 //
GK19asvsaunu:1337: śleṣaṃ tyāgaṃ priyaṃ rūkṣaṃ kathāṃ ca dhyānam eva ca /
GK19asvsaunu:1339: ataś ca saṃdadhe dāyaṃ mahākaruṇayā tayā /
GK19asvsaunu:1340: mocayeyaṃ kathaṃ duḥkhāt sattvānīty anukampakaḥ // Saund_13.8 //
GK19asvsaunu:1342: abravīd bruvatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kramajñaḥ śreyasāṃ kramam // Saund_13.9 //
GK19asvsaunu:1344: amṛtasyāptaye saumya vṛttaṃ rakṣitum arhasi // Saund_13.10 //
GK19asvsaunu:1345: prayogaḥ kāyavacasoḥ śuddho bhavati te yathā /
GK19asvsaunu:1346: uttāno nivṛto gupto 'navacchidras tathā kuru // Saund_13.11 //
GK19asvsaunu:1352: tyāgāc ca jyotiṣādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ vṛttighātinām // Saund_13.14 //
GK19asvsaunu:1356: kuryā duḥkhapratīkāraṃ yāvad eva vimuktaye // Saund_13.16 //
GK19asvsaunu:1358: ājīvaḥ pṛthag evokto duḥṣodhatvād ayaṃ mayā // Saund_13.17 //

GK19asvsaunu:2130: śāntasya tuṣṭasya sukho viveko vijñātattvasya parīkṣakasya /
GK19asvsaunu:2131: prahīṇamānasya ca nirmadasya sukhaṃ virāgatvam asaktabuddheḥ // Saund_18.42 //
GK19asvsaunu:2132: ato hi tattvaṃ parigamya samyañ nirdhūya doṣān adhigamya śāntim /
GK19asvsaunu:2133: svaṃ nāśrayaṃ saṃprati cintayāmi na taṃ janaṃ nāpsaraso na devān // Saund_18.43 //
GK19asvsaunu:2134: idaṃ hi bhuktvā suci śāmikaṃ sukhaṃ na me manaḥ kāṃṣati kāmjaṃ sukham /
GK19asvsaunu:2135: mahārham apy annam adaivāhṛtaṃ divaukaso bhuktavataḥ sudhām iva // Saund_18.44 //
GK19asvsaunu:2136: aho 'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham /
GK19asvsaunu:2137: sudhīram adhyātmasukhaṃ vyapāsya hi śramaṃ tathā kāmasukhārtham ṛcchati // Saund_18.45 //
GK19asvsaunu:2138: yathā hi ratnākaram etya durmatir vihāya ratnāny asato maṇin haret /
GK19asvsaunu:2139: apāsya saṃbodhisukhaṃ tahottamaṃ śramaṃ vrajet kāmasukhopaabdhaye // Saund_18.46 //
GK19asvsaunu:2140: aho hi satteṣv atimaitracetasas tathāgatasyānujighṛkṣutā parā /
GK19asvsaunu:2141: apāsya yad dhyānasukhaṃ mune paraṃ parasya duḥkhoparamāya khidyase // Saund_18.47 //
GK19asvsaunu:2142: mayā na śakyaṃ pratikartum adya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇy anukampake tvayi /
GK19asvsaunu:2143: samuddhṛto yena bhavārṇavād ahaṃ mahārṇavāc cūrṇitanaur ivormibhiḥ // Saund_18.48 //
GK19asvsaunu:2144: tato munis tasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2145: idaṃ babhāṣe vadatām anuttamo yad arhati śrīghana eva bhāṣitum // Saund_18.49 //
GK19asvsaunu:2146: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvam eva dhīmann abhidhātum arhasi /
GK19asvsaunu:2147: atītya kāntāram avāptasādhanaḥ sudaiśikasyeva kṛtaṃ mahāvaṇik // Saund_18.50 //
GK19asvsaunu:2148: avaiti buddhaṃ naradamyasārthiṃ kṛtī yathārhann upśāntamānasaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2149: na dṛṣṭasatyo 'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃ bata buddhimān api // Saund_18.51 //
GK19asvsaunu:2150: rajastamobhyāṃ parimuktacetasas tavaiva ceyaṃ sadṛsī kṛtajñatā /
GK19asvsaunu:2151: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagaty avasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ // Saund_18.52 //
GK19asvsaunu:2152: ato 'sti bhūyas tvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaś ca niyogam arhasi // Saund_18.53 //
GK19asvsaunu:2153: avāptakāryo 'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te 'sti kiṃ cit karaṇīyam aṇv api /
GK19asvsaunu:2154: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parān api // Saund_18.54 //
GK19asvsaunu:2155: ihārtham evārabhate naro 'dhamo vimadhyamas tūbhayalaukikīṃ kriyām /
GK19asvsaunu:2156: kriyām amutraiva phalāya madhyamo viśiṣṭadharmā punar apravṛttaye // Saund_18.55 //
GK19asvsaunu:2157: ihottamebhyo 'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmam avāpya naiṣṭhikam /
GK19asvsaunu:2158: acintayitvātmagataṃ pariśramaṃ śamaṃ parebhyo 'py upadeṣṭum icchati // Saund_18.56 //
GK19asvsaunu:2159: vihāya tasmād iha kāryam ātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryam apy atho /
GK19asvsaunu:2160: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamovṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatām ayam // Saund_18.57 //
GK19asvsaunu:2161: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janas tvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2162: aho batāścaryam idaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yad ayam kathām iti // Saund_18.58 //
GK19asvsaunu:2163: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayair manorathaiḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2164: vadhūr gṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ // Saund_18.59 //
GK19asvsaunu:2165: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā /
GK19asvsaunu:2166: manasi śamadamātmaike vivikte matir iva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya // Saund_18.60 //
GK19asvsaunu:2167: ity arhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāstur mūrdhnā vacaś ca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā /
GK19asvsaunu:2168: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvān muneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva // Saund_18.61 //
GK19asvsaunu:2169: bhikṣarthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīr janasyākṣipan lābhālābhasukhāsukhādiṣu samaḥ svasthendriyo niḥspṛhaḥ /
GK19asvsaunu:2170: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine naivonmārgagatān parān paribhavan nātmānam utkarṣayan // Saund_18.62 //
GK19asvsaunu:2171: ity eṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ śrotṝṇāṃ grahaṇārtham anyamanasāṃ kāvyopacārāt kṛtā /
GK19asvsaunu:2172: yan mokṣāt kṛtam anyad atra hi mayā tat kāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ pātuṃ tiktam ivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syād iti // Saund_18.63 //
GK19asvsaunu:2173: prāyeṇālokya lokaṃ viṣayaratiparaṃ mo kṣāt pratihataṃ kāvyavājena tattvaṃ kathitam iha mayā mokṣaḥ param iti /
GK19asvsaunu:2174: tad buddhvā śāmikaṃ yat tad avahitam ito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ pāṃsubhyo dhātujebhyo niyatam upakaraṃ cāmīkaram iti // Saund_18.64 //
GK19asvsaunu:2176: āryasuvarṇākṣīputrasya sāketakasya bhikṣor ācāryabhadantāśvaghoṣasya mahākaver mahāvādinaḥ kṛtir iyam //
